T13D4312-3:207a-35: ma la tsi dang tsi tra ka //
T13D4312-3:207a-36: ka ra b'i ra ka ranydza //
T13D4312-3:207a-37: til mar spu gris bregs pa yi //
T13D4312-3:207a-40: ma la tsi la sogs pa'i sman dang bskol ba'i
T13D4312-3:207a-41: til mar spu gris bregs pa'i rjes la bskus na
T13D4312-3:207a-43: glog pa sel bar byed do //
T13D4312-3:207a-44: des ma zhi na mgo bo yi //
T13D4312-3:207a-45: sbyang bya slon sman sogs pa bya ;
T13D4312-3:207a-47: sbyor ba de dag gis ma zhi na mgo bo'i
T13D4312-3:207a-48: bkru sman la sogs pas mgo bo sbyang ba la
T13D4312-3:207a-49: 'bad par bya'o // mi bzad pa la dang por ni //
T13D4312-3:207a-50: dpral ba'i rtsa la gtar ga bya //
T13D4312-3:207a-51: mgo bo'i bkru sman sna sman gtang //
T13D4312-3:207a-53: mi bzad pa zhes bya ba'i mgo bo'i nad la
T13D4312-3:207b-0: ni dpral @207b ba'i rtsa nas gtar ga gdab pa
T13D4312-3:207b-2: shing mngar bi la ya'i sa bon //
T13D4312-3:207b-3: ru rta ma sha yungs kar bcas //
T13D4312-3:207b-4: sbrang rtsir bcas pa'i 'de gus bsku //
T13D4312-3:207b-6: mi bzad pa'i mgo bo'i nad la /
T13D4312-3:207b-7: shing mngar la sogs pa'i 'de gus bskus na yang phan no //
T13D4312-3:207b-8: rgya skyegs dong ga'i lo ma dang //
T13D4312-3:207b-9: tsa kra marda skyu ru ra //
T13D4312-3:207b-10: sbrang rtsir sbyar bas bskus kyang phan //
T13D4312-3:207b-12: yang de bzhin du nad de la rgya skyegs la sogs pa'i 'de gus bskus na yang phan no //
T13D4312-3:207b-13: khre rgod rtsa bsregs thal ba ni //
T13D4312-3:207b-14: chu dang sbyar bas bskus na phan //
T13D4312-3:207b-16: yang na de la khre rgod la sogs pa bsregs
T13D4312-3:207b-17: pa'i thal ba chu dang sbyar ba bskus na yang
T13D4312-3:207b-18: phan no // 'khor ling skra 'byi'i nad la ni //
T13D4312-3:207b-19: nye bar gtar ga gdab pa dang //
T13D4312-3:207b-20: zhal zhal byas te na le sham //
T13D4312-3:207b-21: ldong ros sbangs [?] ma nag tshur bsku //
T13D4312-3:207b-23: 'khor ling du 'byi ba zhes bya ba'i nad la
T13D4312-3:207b-24: ni nad gang na yod pa dang nye ba'i phyogs
T13D4312-3:207b-26: de'i 'og tu rab tu zhal zhal byas nas /
T13D4312-3:207b-27: na le sham la sogs pa'i sman gyis bsku bar bya'o //
T13D4312-3:207b-28: yang na 'ba' n+ya thang shing ngam //
T13D4312-3:207b-31: yang na 'ba' n+ya zhes bya ba pa ri be la ba dang /
T13D4312-3:207b-32: ku tan na da zhes bya ba dang /
T13D4312-3:207b-34: 'ol ma se'i 'bras bu dang rtsa ba'i 'de gus rab tu zhal zhal btab par bsku bar bya'o //
T13D4312-3:207b-35: yang na longka li'i rtsa ba'am //
T13D4312-3:207b-36: ka ra b'i ra'i khu ba 'am //
T13D4312-3:207b-38: yang na langka li zhes bya ba bi sha lya'i rtsa ba 'am /
T13D4312-3:207b-39: kar b'i ra zhes bya ba aa sho marda'i khu bas bsku bar bya'o //
T13D4312-3:207b-40: kanda ka ri'i khu ba ni //
T13D4312-3:207b-41: sbrang rtsir bcas pas bsku ba 'am //
T13D4312-3:207b-42: dha du ra yi lo ma 'am //
T13D4312-3:207b-43: bse shing 'bras bu'i khu bas bsku //
T13D4312-3:207b-45: yang na kanda ka ri'i 'bras bu'i khu ba sbrang rtsi dang bcas pas bsku ba 'am /
T13D4312-3:207b-46: yang na dha du ra'i lo ma 'am 'bras bu'i 'de gus bsku ba 'am /
T13D4312-3:207b-47: yang na bse shing gi 'bras bu'i 'de gus bsku bar bya'o //
T13D4312-3:207b-48: til gyi me tog gze ma dang //
T13D4312-3:207b-49: mar dang sbrang rtsir bcas pa 'am //
T13D4312-3:207b-51: yang na til gyi me tog la sogs pas bsku bar bya'o //
T13D4312-3:207b-52: glang po'i so bsregs til mar bsres //
T13D4312-3:208a-0: @208a * // yang na glang po che'i so bsregs pa dang til
T13D4312-3:208a-1: mar du ba bsres pa'i snag tsha lta bu ni
T13D4312-3:208a-2: 'khor ling du 'byi ba'i sman gyi mchog yin no
T13D4312-3:208a-3: // skra dkar skyes la lug gi rva'i //
T13D4312-3:208a-4: snag tshas de bzhin bsku bar bya //
T13D4312-3:208a-6: skra dkar skyes pa la ni lug gi rva bsregs
T13D4312-3:208a-7: pa'i snag tsha dang til mar bsres pas de bzhin
T13D4312-3:208a-9: ji srid skra ni skyes kyi bar //
T13D4312-3:208a-10: chu blugs pa ni spang [?] bar bya //
T13D4312-3:208a-12: skra 'byi ba la sman gyi sbyor ba byed pa'i tshe /
T13D4312-3:208a-13: skra skyes kyi bar du chu blugs pa spang bar bya'o //
T13D4312-3:208a-14: spyi cer skra dkar gnyer ma mang //
T13D4312-3:208a-15: skra ser skyes la sbyang byas nas ;
T13D4312-3:208a-16: / sna sman gtang dang mgo bkrus la //
T13D4312-3:208a-17: byug pa rnams kyis gso bar bya //
T13D4312-3:208a-19: spyi cer la sogs pa la sbyang ba legs par
T13D4312-3:208a-20: byas nas sna sman la sogs pas gso bar bya'o
T13D4312-3:208a-21: // bri ha ti sogs til mar bskol //
T13D4312-3:208a-22: 'tsho byed bskol ba'i sna sman blugs //
T13D4312-3:208a-24: yang de la bri ha ti la sogs pa lnga dang /
T13D4312-3:208a-26: 'tsho byed kyi sde tshan dang bskol ba'i til mar gyi sna sman blugs par bya'o //
T13D4312-3:208a-27: nim pa'i mar gyis zla ba gcig / sna sman btang ste 'o ma blud //
T13D4312-3:208a-29: yang na nim pa'i mar gyi sna sman blugs shing 'o ma blud la /
T13D4312-3:208a-30: shin tu gdams pa dang bcas par bya'o //
T13D4312-3:208a-31: shir sha ae randa dang rams //
T13D4312-3:208a-32: bring ga r'a dza'i khu bar sbangs //
T13D4312-3:208a-33: se'u lu til dang ba ru ra //
T13D4312-3:208a-34: pri yang ka ka ta'i sa bon //
T13D4312-3:208a-35: cha mnyam lcags la bskol nas ni //
T13D4312-3:208a-36: nyi mi'i 'od la bskams nas ni //
T13D4312-3:208a-37: mar 'jag pa yi sna sman gtang ;
T13D4312-3:208a-40: shir sha la sogs pa'i sman ji skad smos pa'i sbyor ba'i sna sman du bya ba ste /
T13D4312-3:208a-41: de yang se'u lu zhes bya ba sle sman ta ka dang /
T13D4312-3:208a-45: ka ka aan ta'i sa bon cha mnyam pa shri
T13D4312-3:208a-46: sha la sogs pa'i khu bar sbangs pa 'o ma
T13D4312-3:208a-47: dang btags la lcags kyi snod la bskol te nyi
T13D4312-3:208a-48: ma'i 'od la skams pa las mar 'dzag pa gang
T13D4312-3:208a-49: yin pa'i sna sman btang zhing /
T13D4312-3:208a-50: de'i rjes la 'o ma blud na skra dkar sel bar 'gyur ro //
T13D4312-3:208a-51: sa ha tsa ra bye'u rug pa //
T13D4312-3:208a-52: bring ga r'a dza'i khu ba ni //
T13D4312-3:208a-53: bre gang til mar phul gang dang //
T13D4312-3:208b-0: @208b shing mngar srang gcig btab ste bskol //
T13D4312-3:208b-1: aa sa na'am rdo snod dam //
T13D4312-3:208b-2: lug gi rva yi nang du gzhug / ces bya ba la /
T13D4312-3:208b-3: sa ha tsa ra la sogs pa'i khu ba bre gang dang /
T13D4312-3:208b-4: 'o ma dang til mar phul re 'am /
T13D4312-3:208b-5: shing mngar srang gcig lhan cig bskol ba'i til mar aa sa ni'i snod dam /
T13D4312-3:208b-7: lug gi rva'i nang du gzhug la sna sman gtang bar bya'o //
T13D4312-3:208b-8: ka ra b'i ra pa ya sya //
T13D4312-3:208b-9: 'o ma dang ni zhib btags pas //
T13D4312-3:208b-10: skra dkar phyung ba'i rjes bskus shing //
T13D4312-3:208b-11: spangs na skra dkar sel bar byed //
T13D4312-3:208b-13: kar b'i ra dang ba la sya 'o ma dang zhib tu btags te /
T13D4312-3:208b-14: skra dkar dang po phyung la skra dkar gyi rjes la bskus na skra dkar sel bar byed do //
T13D4312-3:208b-15: pi la ya dang shing mngar dang //
T13D4312-3:208b-16: 'tsho byed sde tshan til nag dang //
T13D4312-3:208b-17: sa nag 'o ma'i lde gu yis //
T13D4312-3:208b-18: gdong bskus gnyer ma spu ser sel //
T13D4312-3:208b-20: pi la ya la sogs pa'i lde gus bskus na yang gnyer ma lhags pa dang ;
T13D4312-3:208b-21: ba spu ser po skyes pa sel bar byed do //
T13D4312-3:208b-22: til dang padma ge sar dang //
T13D4312-3:208b-23: shing mngar sbrang rtsi skyu ru ra //
T13D4312-3:208b-24: lde gu 'di yis mgo bskus na //
T13D4312-3:208b-27: til la sogs pa'i sman lde gur byas pa 'dis
T13D4312-3:208b-28: mgo la bskus na skra 'phel ba dang nag por
T13D4312-3:208b-30: spang spos ru rta til nag dang //
T13D4312-3:208b-31: thal tres autpal sngon po dang //
T13D4312-3:208b-32: 'o mar btags te sbrang rtsir sbyar //
T13D4312-3:208b-33: skra ni 'phel bar byed pa'i mchog / ces bya ba la /
T13D4312-3:208b-34: spang spos la sogs pa'i lde gus bskus na yang skra 'phel bar byed pa yin no //
T13D4312-3:208b-35: lcags phye bring ga r'a dza dang //
T13D4312-3:208b-36: 'bras bu gsum dang sa nag po //
T13D4312-3:208b-37: bu ram shing khur zla gcig gzhug / skra dkar rtsad nas skyur bar byed //
T13D4312-3:208b-39: lcags phye la sogs pa bu ram shing gi khu bar zla ba gcig gi bar du gzhug la /
T13D4312-3:208b-40: de'i lde gus skra dkar rtsa ba nas tshon sgyur bar byed cing nag por byed do ;
T13D4312-3:208b-41: / ma sha khre rgod skyur rtsabs dang //
T13D4312-3:208b-42: nas thug lcags phye tsha mang btab //
T13D4312-3:208b-43: zhag gsum bzhag ste btags pa yis //
T13D4312-3:208b-44: bya dkar yang na nag por byed //
T13D4312-3:208b-46: ma sha zhes bya ba mon sran sde'u dang /
T13D4312-3:208b-47: khre rgod la sogs pa dang sbyar ba'i nas thug byas te /
T13D4312-3:209a-2: zhag gsum gyi bar du bzhag la /
T13D4312-3:209a-3: de'i 'og tu btags te skra la bskus na bya dkar yang nag por byed na /
T13D4312-3:209a-4: skra lta smos kyang ci dgos te 'di ni khyad
T13D4312-3:209a-5: par can yod par bstan pa'i phyir smos pa yin
T13D4312-3:209a-6: no // shing mngar tsandan stag tsher dang //
T13D4312-3:209a-7: pi pi ling dang autpal dang //
T13D4312-3:209a-8: skyu ru ra khu til mar bskol //
T13D4312-3:209a-9: sna sman bsku ba byas gyur na //
T13D4312-3:209a-10: skra dkar dang ni klad pa yi //
T13D4312-3:209a-11: nad kun 'joms par byed pa yin //
T13D4312-3:209a-13: shing mngar la sogs pa'i 'de gu dang skyu ru
T13D4312-3:209a-14: ra'i khu ba dang til mar sbyor ba ji lta
T13D4312-3:209a-16: sna sman dang bsku ba byas na skra dkar dang klad pa'i nad thams cad sel bar byed do //
T13D4312-3:209a-17: nye'u shing dzi banti'i khu ba //
T13D4312-3:209a-18: 'o ma mar dang til mar dang //
T13D4312-3:209a-19: 'tsho byed bskol ba'i sna sman gyis //
T13D4312-3:209a-20: nam tshong yan chad nad kun sel //
T13D4312-3:209a-22: nye'u shing dzi banti bskol ba'i khu ba dang /
T13D4312-3:209a-23: 'o ma dang 'tsho byed kyi sde tshan dang bcas
T13D4312-3:209a-24: par bskol ba'i sna sman 'dis ni nam tshong yan
T13D4312-3:209a-25: chad kyi nad thams cad sel bar byed do //
T13D4312-3:209a-26: rma bya'i sgro mkhris rgyu ma dang //
T13D4312-3:209a-27: rkang pa rtug pa chu bor ba'i //
T13D4312-3:209a-28: sha dang ba la rtsa ba bcu //
T13D4312-3:209a-29: ra sna shing mngar srang gsum gsum //
T13D4312-3:209a-30: chu bskol khu ba mar bre gang //
T13D4312-3:209a-31: 'o ma bre gang bcas bskol ba //
T13D4312-3:209a-32: mngar ba'i sman sde'i lde gu btab //
T13D4312-3:209a-33: de btung mas gtong bsku ba dang //
T13D4312-3:209a-34: sna sman rtag tu bsten pa yis //
T13D4312-3:209a-35: nam tshong yan chad nad kun sel //
T13D4312-3:209a-37: rma bya'i sha sgro la sogs pa bor ba dang /
T13D4312-3:209a-38: rtsa ba bcu la sogs pa'i sman la ltos pa'i chu bcu drug 'gyur du byas pa yin gyi /
T13D4312-3:209a-39: sha la ltos pa ni ma yin te /
T13D4312-3:209a-41: ra sna la sogs pa'i sman mar dang 'dra'o //
T13D4312-3:209a-42: chu der bskol ba bre bzhi lus pa'i nang du
T13D4312-3:209a-43: mar bre gang dang 'o ma bre gang dang bcas
T13D4312-3:209a-44: par bskol la mngar ba'i sman gyi sde tshan srang
T13D4312-3:209a-45: brgyad kyi lde gu btab ste bskol la /
T13D4312-3:209a-46: de btung ba la sogs pa'i sbyor bas bsten na
T13D4312-3:209a-47: nam tshong yan chad kyi nad thams cad sel bar
T13D4312-3:209a-48: byed do // sman 'di dag gi lde gu dang //
T13D4312-3:209a-50: me da rgun 'brum dbyi mo dang //
T13D4312-3:209a-51: pa ru sha ka sa mang ga //
T13D4312-3:209a-52: ga bra'i rtsa ba tang pal dang //
T13D4312-3:209b-0: karka ta sring kha @209b sral phre'u //
T13D4312-3:209b-1: ma h'a me da ta la dang //
T13D4312-3:209b-4: shing mngar nye'u shing dzi ba ka //
T13D4312-3:209b-5: bi da ri dang bu ram shing //
T13D4312-3:209b-6: thal tres rnam gnyis bri ha ti //
T13D4312-3:209b-7: mur ba gzem [?] zangs [?] rtsi ba //
T13D4312-3:209b-8: sring ga ta dang ka she ru //
T13D4312-3:209b-9: ra sna sthi ra lca ba dang //
T13D4312-3:209b-10: sug smel zur pa ma nu dang //
T13D4312-3:209b-11: ba spru ba dang cu gang dang //
T13D4312-3:209b-12: ram nye ba dang byi tsher ba //
T13D4312-3:209b-13: ma du ka dang star ga dang //
T13D4312-3:209b-14: aa bi shu ka munydza ka //
T13D4312-3:209b-15: zho ni gnyis gnyis phyer btags dang //
T13D4312-3:209b-16: mar bre gang dang 'o ma ni //
T13D4312-3:209b-17: bzhi 'gyur dag dang bskol ba'i mar //
T13D4312-3:209b-18: 'di ni rma bya chen po ste //
T13D4312-3:209b-19: rma bya las ni yon tan lhag /
T13D4312-3:209b-20: lus zungs dbang po nyams skad 'gags //
T13D4312-3:209b-21: lud pa dbugs mi bde nyen 'joms //
T13D4312-3:209b-22: zla mtshan khu ba'i skyon la'ang phan //
T13D4312-3:209b-23: mo gsham la yang bu skyed byed //
T13D4312-3:209b-25: sman bshad ma thag pa 'di dag gi 'de gu dang //
T13D4312-3:209b-26: dzi ban ti la sogs pa zho gnyis gnyis kyi 'de gu dang /
T13D4312-3:209b-28: 'o ma bzhi 'gyur dang bcas pa bskol ba 'di
T13D4312-3:209b-29: ni rma bya chen po'i mar bas yon tan che
T13D4312-3:209b-30: ba yin te / lus zungs nyams pa la sogs pa 'joms pa dang /
T13D4312-3:209b-31: zla mtshan dang khu ba'i skyon la sogs pa nad
T13D4312-3:209b-32: phra mo yang sel cing mo gsham lta bu la
T13D4312-3:209b-33: yang bu skyed par byed pa yin no //
T13D4312-3:209b-34: byi ba khyim bya ngang pa dang //
T13D4312-3:209b-35: ri bong dang yang de bzhin sbyar //
T13D4312-3:209b-37: byi ba la sogs pa re re zhing yang rma
T13D4312-3:209b-38: bya'i sman mar gyi tshul du sbyar bar bya ba'i
T13D4312-3:209b-39: don no // nam tshong yan chad gtogs pa'i nad //
T13D4312-3:209b-40: nyis brgya sum cu rtsa gcig yin //
T13D4312-3:209b-41: de dag phan tshun ma 'dres par //
T13D4312-3:209b-42: rgya cher rab tu bshad pa yin //
T13D4312-3:209b-44: nam tshong yan chad du gtogs pa'i nad spyir grangs
T13D4312-3:209b-45: nyis brgya sum cu rtsa gcig yod pa yin la
T13D4312-3:209b-46: / de dag kyang phan tshun mtshan nyid ma 'dres
T13D4312-3:209b-47: par rgya cher rab tu bstan cing bshad pa yin
T13D4312-3:209b-48: / no // drang srong rnams kyis skyes bu'i mgo //
T13D4312-3:209b-49: rtsa ba 'og ni yal gar bshad //
T13D4312-3:209b-50: de phyir rtsa ba la gnod pa'i //
T13D4312-3:209b-51: nad ni myur du gso bar bya //
T13D4312-3:209b-53: drang srong rnams kyis skyes bu'i mgo bo ni rtsa ba yin la /
T13D4312-3:209b-54: mgo bo man chad kyi 'og tu ma lus pa thams cad ni yan lag yin par bshad de /
T13D4312-3:210a-1: bar gyur pa mgo bo la gnod par gyur pa'i
T13D4312-3:210a-2: nad rnams ni shin tu rings pa kho nar gso
T13D4312-3:210a-4: gang la dbang po kun rten zhing //
T13D4312-3:210a-5: gang la srog ni gnas byed pas //
T13D4312-3:210a-6: des na yan lag dam pa yi //
T13D4312-3:210a-7: bsrung ba la ni 'bad par bya //
T13D4312-3:210a-9: mgo bo gang la rgyu gang gis mig la sogs pa'i dbang po kun rten par byed pa dang /
T13D4312-3:210a-10: gang la srog gi dbang po gnas par byed pa'i
T13D4312-3:210a-11: rgyu des na yan lag dam par gyur pa'i mgo
T13D4312-3:210a-12: bo de bsrung zhing gnod pa med par bya ba
T13D4312-3:210a-13: la sman pas 'bad cing brtson pa nyid du bya'o
T13D4312-3:210a-14: // mgo bo'i nad gso ba'i rgyud rdzogs so /
T13D4312-3:210a-17: // / yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba /
T13D4312-3:210a-18: slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyang ba las /
T13D4312-3:210a-19: phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T13D4312-3:210a-21: // / de nas rma gso ba bshad par bya'o //
T13D4312-3:210a-23: yan lag brgyad pa'i gso ba las yan lag bzhi bshad nas /
T13D4312-3:210a-24: da ni go rims kyis na rab tu byed pa lnga pa brtsams pa yin te /
T13D4312-3:210a-25: de la rma rnams kyi nad kyi nyes pa dgag pa'i rma gso ba ste /
T13D4312-3:210a-26: de'i le'u bshad par bya'o zhes pa'o //
T13D4312-3:210a-27: rma ni lhan cig skyes glo bur //
T13D4312-3:210a-28: red dang ma red dbye ba gnyis //

T13D4312-3:216a-27: bad kan las gyur dong ga'i sde //
T13D4312-3:216a-28: bad kan 'joms par byed pa gtang //
T13D4312-3:216a-30: bad kan las gyur pa'i rma la ni dong ga la sogs pa'i sde chan dang /
T13D4312-3:216a-31: bad kan 'joms par byed pa'i sman gzhan dag kyang bya'o //
T13D4312-3:216a-34: ldan pa dang 'dus pa las gyur pa'i rma la ni sman gyi sde tshan 'dren ma phan te /
T13D4312-3:216a-35: bye'u rug pa la sogs pa dang gla sgang dang
T13D4312-3:216a-36: aarka la sogs pa'i sde tshan 'dren ma phan no
T13D4312-3:216a-37: // 'di dag gis bkru byug pa dang //
T13D4312-3:216a-38: sman mar til mar sman khu dang //
T13D4312-3:216a-39: phye ma ril bu bdun po ni //
T13D4312-3:216a-40: rma la ci rigs sbyar bar bya //
T13D4312-3:216a-42: bshad ma thag pa'i rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad
T13D4312-3:216a-43: kan la phan par bshad pa'i sde tshan dag gis
T13D4312-3:216a-44: bkru ba dang byug pa la sogs pa'i sbyor ba
T13D4312-3:216a-45: bdun po de dag ji ltar rigs pa bzhin du
T13D4312-3:216a-46: sbyar bar bya'o // dz'a ti nim pa ba to la'i lo ma //
T13D4312-3:216a-47: skyer pa yung ba thal tres bu tse shel //
T13D4312-3:216a-48: spra tshil spangs ma shing mngar aa ru ra /
T13D4312-3:216a-49: karanydza yi sa bon btsod dang bcos //
T13D4312-3:216a-50: mar bskol 'dis ni rma kha chung ba dang //
T13D4312-3:216a-51: gnad la brten cing rnag ni 'jag pa dang //
T13D4312-3:216a-52: rma yi phugs ring nad bcas phugs ring ba'i //
T13D4312-3:216b-0: rma ni dag cing @216b 'tshob bar byed pa yin //
T13D4312-3:216b-2: dz'a ti la [?] sogs pa'i sman gyi lde gu
T13D4312-3:216b-3: ngang bskol ba'i sman mar gyis ni rma kha chung
T13D4312-3:216b-4: ba la sogs pa'i rma de dag cing 'tshob par
T13D4312-3:216b-6: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa
T13D4312-3:216b-7: tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba slob
T13D4312-3:216b-8: dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba
T13D4312-3:216b-9: las / phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa lnga ba'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T13D4312-3:216b-11: // / de nas 'phral du byung ba'i rma'i gso ba bshad par bya'o //
T13D4312-3:216b-12: rma gang snad pas 'phral du ni //
T13D4312-3:216b-13: byung gyur blo bur rma zhes bya /
T13D4312-3:216b-14: de ni mtha' yas kyang yan lag / gnas pa rnam pa brgyad du bshad //
T13D4312-3:216b-16: rma gang zhig snad pa las 'phral du byung bar
T13D4312-3:216b-17: gyur pa de ni glo bur ba'i rma zhes bya'o
T13D4312-3:216b-18: // de ni mtha' yas pa yin du zin kyang
T13D4312-3:216b-19: yan lag la gnas pa'i dbang po dag gis rnam
T13D4312-3:216b-21: shus dang bcad dang rnam par bcad //
T13D4312-3:216b-22: rab tu 'phyang dang ltung ba dang //
T13D4312-3:216b-23: phug dang gshags dang grugs ba'o [?] //
T13D4312-3:216b-25: brgyad po de dag kyang shus pa la sogs pa'i dbye bas brgyad du bshad do //
T13D4312-3:216b-26: de la shus pa chu ser ram //
T13D4312-3:216b-28: pags pa tshos pas tsha 'gyur yin //
T13D4312-3:216b-30: de la de dag gi nang nas shus pa ni
T13D4312-3:216b-31: bdar cing pags pa shus pa'i dbang gis chu ser
T13D4312-3:216b-32: ram khrag nyung shas zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang
T13D4312-3:216b-33: / pags pa tshos bas tsha bar 'gyur pa yin no //
T13D4312-3:216b-34: de la tshos gyur bcad pa yin //
T13D4312-3:216b-36: shus pa de las kyang rma nang du zhugs shing
T13D4312-3:216b-37: pags pa shas cher tshos par gyur pa ni bcad
T13D4312-3:216b-39: de las kyang zab par gyur pa ni rnam par bcad pa zhes bya'o //
T13D4312-3:216b-40: rab 'phyang rus par lhag ma lus //
T13D4312-3:216b-41: ltung ba lus las bogs pa yin //
T13D4312-3:216b-43: rab tu 'phyang ba ni rus par lhag ma tsam lus shing de dang 'brel pa las bya la /
T13D4312-3:216b-44: ltung ba ni gang yang lus las nyid lag la
T13D4312-3:216b-45: sogs pa'i chogs pogs [?] shing sa la lhags pa
T13D4312-3:216b-47: zug rngu phra mo 'bigs pas phug //
T13D4312-3:216b-48: khong pa ma gtogs bsnun pa yin //
T13D4312-3:216b-50: mtshon rtse mos phug pa gang yin pa de ni phug pa zhes bya ste /
T13D4312-3:217a-0: de yang khong pa ma gtogs pa gnas gzhan du @217a * //
T13D4312-3:217a-2: snga ma las gzhan gshags pa yin //
T13D4312-3:217a-4: sngar bshad pa las gzhan pa ste mtshon kha zheng che bas bsnun pa dang /
T13D4312-3:217a-5: khod par song ba la ni gshags pa zhes bya'o //
T13D4312-3:217a-6: khrag dang rkang ni 'dres gyur par //
T13D4312-3:217a-7: mtshon gyis drag tu bsnun pa yis //
T13D4312-3:217a-8: rus bcas rgya cher snang grugs pa //
T13D4312-3:217a-10: grugs pa ni mtshon gyis phog pa'i rgyu gang gis khrag dang rkang 'dres par gyur cing /
T13D4312-3:217a-11: rus pa dang bcas brgya cher snad par gyur ba ni grugs pa zhes bya'o //
T13D4312-3:217a-12: de nas 'phral du byung ba'i rma //
T13D4312-3:217a-13: zug gzer shin tu che ba la //
T13D4312-3:217a-14: shing mngar mar dang bskol ba 'am //
T13D4312-3:217a-15: ba la'i til mar dro 'jam blugs //
T13D4312-3:217a-17: 'phral du rna byung ba mi bzad par na ba
T13D4312-3:217a-18: la ni shing mngar bskol ba'i mar dro 'jam tsam
T13D4312-3:217a-20: yang na ba la'i til mar dro 'jam tsam gyis blugs par bya'o //
T13D4312-3:217a-21: snad ba'i tsha bzhi bya'i phyir //
T13D4312-3:217a-22: bsku ba la sogs snum pa dang //
T13D4312-3:217a-23: bsil dang mngar ba'i sman gyis ni //
T13D4312-3:217a-24: de yi mod la blugs par bya //
T13D4312-3:217a-26: snad cing rma 'byung ba las gyur pa'i tsha ba
T13D4312-3:217a-27: zhi bar bya ba'i phyir bsku ba la sogs pa
T13D4312-3:217a-28: bsil ba dang mngar ba'i sman dag gis bya'o //
T13D4312-3:217a-29: 'phral gyi rma ni rgya che la //
T13D4312-3:217a-30: sbyar ba'i phyir ni sbrang rtsi dang //
T13D4312-3:217a-31: mar gyis mchog tu bsku bya zhing //
T13D4312-3:217a-32: mkhris 'joms bsil ba'i gso ba bya //
T13D4312-3:217a-34: 'phral du byung ba rma rgya cher gyur ba slar
T13D4312-3:217a-35: sbyar ba'i phyir ni sbrang rtsi dang mar sbyar bas
T13D4312-3:217a-36: bskus na mchog tu phan no //
T13D4312-3:217a-37: de bzhin du mkhris bsel ba'i gso ba bsil bdag gi bya ba yang phan no //
T13D4312-3:217a-38: nad kyi rtsom pa che ba la //
T13D4312-3:217a-39: steng dang 'og nas sbyang bar bya //
T13D4312-3:217a-41: rma nad kyi rtsom pa che zhing shas cher zhugs pa la ni /
T13D4312-3:217a-42: steng dang 'og nas skyug sman dang bkru sman gyis sbyang ba bya'o //
T13D4312-3:217a-43: smyung ba bya zhing 'bras chan sbyin //
T13D4312-3:217a-44: rgyun du gtar ga gdab par bya //
T13D4312-3:217a-46: yang na nad tshabs cher g-yo ba'i rma la ni smyung ba bya zhing zas bcad pa dang /
T13D4312-3:217a-47: 'bras chan nyung zhing sbyin pa dang /
T13D4312-3:217a-48: rgyun du gtar ga gdab cing khrag dbyung ba phan no //
T13D4312-3:217a-49: shus dang grugs pa 'di nyid de //
T13D4312-3:217a-50: cho ga 'di ni lhag par sbyar //
T13D4312-3:217a-51: de gnyis khrag ni nyung shas 'dzag //
T13D4312-3:217b-0: smin pa'ang myur @217b ba nyid du 'gyur //
T13D4312-3:217b-2: shus pa dang grugs pa dag la ni bshad ma
T13D4312-3:217b-3: thag pa'i chog 'di dag lhag par sbyar bar bya
T13D4312-3:217b-5: shus pa dang grugs pa de gnyis ni khrag nyung
T13D4312-3:217b-6: shas 'dzag par byed pas na rgyu de'i phyir de
T13D4312-3:217b-7: gnyis ni myur du smin par 'gyur ba yin no
T13D4312-3:217b-8: // phal cher rma ni shas cher 'byung //
T13D4312-3:217b-9: gzhan las khrag ni 'byung gyur la //
T13D4312-3:217b-10: de yis khrag ni zad gyur pas //
T13D4312-3:217b-11: rlung 'khrugs nad ni bskyed pa las //
T13D4312-3:217b-12: rlung 'joms sman dang bskol ba yi //
T13D4312-3:217b-13: snum blugs pa dang sman chu blugs //
T13D4312-3:217b-14: dugs dang bsku dang dkri ba dang //
T13D4312-3:217b-15: snum gyi 'dzam rtsi rnams kyang bya //
T13D4312-3:217b-17: phal cher rma tshabs po che byung ba la rma
T13D4312-3:217b-18: las gzhan pa'i phyogs nas khrag 'byung bar gyur la
T13D4312-3:217b-19: / rgyu des khrag zad par gyur cing /
T13D4312-3:217b-20: zhes rlung shin tu 'khrugs te nad mi bzad ba
T13D4312-3:217b-21: bskyed par gyur pa la ni rlung 'joms pa'i sman
T13D4312-3:217b-22: dang bskol ba'i snum blugs pa la sogs ba'i sbyor
T13D4312-3:217b-23: ba bya'o // de ltar zhag bdun par bshad pa'i //
T13D4312-3:217b-26: de ltar bshad ma thag pa'i tshul gyis zhag bdun
T13D4312-3:217b-27: gyi bar du bya bar bshad pa'i 'phral du byung
T13D4312-3:217b-28: ba'i rma'i chog bshad pa yin no //
T13D4312-3:217b-29: zhag bdun nas ni shugs zad nas //
T13D4312-3:217b-30: sngar bshad pa yi cho gas spyad //
T13D4312-3:217b-32: rma sar pa'i shugs zad par gyur cing zhag bdun
T13D4312-3:217b-33: 'das pa'i 'og tu ni sngar bshad pa'i rma gso
T13D4312-3:217b-34: ba'i chog ji skad smos pas spyad par bya'o //
T13D4312-3:217b-35: 'di ni phal cher spyi'i cho ga //
T13D4312-3:217b-36: re re'i gso ba bshad bya ste //
T13D4312-3:217b-38: shus pa la sogs pa'i rma gsar pa la /
T13D4312-3:217b-39: 'di dag ni spyi'i cho ga tsam du bshad pa
T13D4312-3:217b-40: yin zhing thun mong gi gso bar bstan pa yin
T13D4312-3:217b-41: la / de rnams kyi re re'i gso ba ni da gzod bshad par bya'o //
T13D4312-3:217b-42: shus lan pa myur bsal phyir //
T13D4312-3:217b-43: rma la phan pa'i phye mas gdab /
T13D4312-3:217b-44: bcad pa rma sel lde gus bsku //
T13D4312-3:217b-46: shus pa'i rma la ni nad de myur du bsal ba'i phyir /
T13D4312-3:217b-47: rma la phan ba'i phyam gdab par bya'o //
T13D4312-3:217b-48: bcad pa'i rma la ni rma la phan pa'i sman gyi lde gus bsku bar bya'o //
T13D4312-3:217b-49: rnam par bcad dad rab 'phyang la //
T13D4312-3:217b-50: cho ga bzhin du btsem pa dang //
T13D4312-3:217b-51: bcing ba dang ni btsir bar bya //
T13D4312-3:218a-1: bcad ba dang rab tu 'phyang ba'i rma la ni
T13D4312-3:218a-2: sngar ji skad bshad pa bzhin du btsem par bya
T13D4312-3:218a-3: ba 'am / de bzhin du bcing ba dang /
T13D4312-3:218a-4: btsir ba'i sbyor ba dag bya'o //
T13D4312-3:218a-5: mig bcar na ni gsor mi rung //
T13D4312-3:218a-7: mig gi 'bras bu bcar zhing nyams par gyur ba de gsor mi rung ngo ;
T13D4312-3:218a-8: / ma zhar phyir ni 'phyang ba la //
T13D4312-3:218a-9: rang gi gnas su legs bzhag cing //
T13D4312-3:218a-12: lag pas dal gyis mnan par bya //
T13D4312-3:218a-14: mig gang zhar bar ma gyur la gnas las 'phags
T13D4312-3:218a-15: te phyir 'phyang bar gyur ba de ni rang gi
T13D4312-3:218a-16: gnas su legs par ma 'chug par bzhag ste rtsab
T13D4312-3:218a-18: sman bas snrel zhir ma gyur par gzhag la /
T13D4312-3:218a-19: de'i 'og tu padma'i 'dab mas g-yogs la /
T13D4312-3:218a-20: de'i steng nas sman ba'i lag pas dal gyis mnan bar bya'o //
T13D4312-3:218a-21: de nas shing mngar dzi baka / zangs rtsib dang autpal //
T13D4312-3:218a-22: mar dang 'o ma bcas bskol ba'i //
T13D4312-3:218a-23: sman thigs blugs dang sna sman dang //
T13D4312-3:218a-24: brta ba'i chog dag kyang bya //
T13D4312-3:218a-25: mig nad thams cad sel mchog yin //
T13D4312-3:218a-27: de'i 'og tu mig de la shing mngar la sogs
T13D4312-3:218a-28: ba'i lde gu dang mar dang 'o mar bcas pa
T13D4312-3:218a-29: bskol ba'i sna sman la sogs pa bya ste /
T13D4312-3:218a-30: gang gi phyir de ni mig snad [?] pa thams
T13D4312-3:218a-31: cad sel bar byed pa'i mchog yin pa'i phyir ro
T13D4312-3:218a-32: // mig phugs zhugs la mgul pa bsdam //
T13D4312-3:218a-33: slon dang lud ba sbrid pa 'byung //
T13D4312-3:218a-34: yang na dbugs 'byung dbugs brngub bsdam //
T13D4312-3:218a-35: rma byung mig gi gso ba bya //
T13D4312-3:218a-37: mig phugs su zhugs shing gting du bros pa la ni mgul pa bsdam par bya ba dang /
T13D4312-3:218a-38: slon zhing skyugs pa dang lud pa dang sbrid pa 'byung bar bya ba dang /
T13D4312-3:218a-40: brngub pa dang bsdam par bya ba dang /
T13D4312-3:218a-41: de bzhin du rma byung ba'i mig gi gso ba ji skad bshad pa dag bya'o ;
T13D4312-3:218a-42: / rna ba pogs pa btsems nas ni //
T13D4312-3:218a-43: bu ga til mar dag gis dgang //
T13D4312-3:218a-45: rnab gnas las bogs pa la ni de la legs
T13D4312-3:218a-46: par btsems la rna ba'i bu ga til mar gyis
T13D4312-3:218a-47: dgang bar bya'o // ltag pa'i sum mdo chod gyur te //
T13D4312-3:218a-48: rlung ni 'byung bar gyur pa la'ang //
T13D4312-3:218b-0: mnyam @218b dug zhag ste bar mtshams ni //
T13D4312-3:218b-1: med par btsems te bcing par bya //
T13D4312-3:218b-3: ltag pa'i sum mdo chod par gyur te rlung byung
T13D4312-3:218b-4: bar gyur na yang ltag pa de ltar mnyam por
T13D4312-3:218b-5: gzhag ste / legs par btsems la de'i 'og tu ci rigs pa'i bcing bas bcing bar bya'o //
T13D4312-3:218b-6: de lang [?] yi mar sar gyis //
T13D4312-3:218b-7: blugs pa dag ni rab tu bsngags //
T13D4312-3:218b-9: de ltar bcings pa'i ltag ba de la ra'i mar sar blugs pa dag phan no //
T13D4312-3:218b-10: gan rkyal bzhag ste kha zas sbyin //
T13D4312-3:218b-11: legs par spyod lam bsdams te nyal //
T13D4312-3:218b-13: ltag pa chod de bcings pa de ni kha zas
T13D4312-3:218b-14: kyang gan rkyal du bzhag ste zar gzhug pa dang
T13D4312-3:218b-15: / de bzhin du nyal ba na yang rma la mi gnod par nyal du gzhug par bya'o //
T13D4312-3:218b-16: yan lag thad kar gnas pa yi //
T13D4312-3:218b-17: rma byung yan lag legs gzhag ste //
T13D4312-3:218b-18: btsems la dkri zhing bcing bya zhing //
T13D4312-3:218b-19: gos ni mthug pos bcing bar bya //
T13D4312-3:218b-21: lag ngar dang byin pa dag tu thad kar gnas
T13D4312-3:218b-22: pa'i rma byung ba la ni yan lag legs par
T13D4312-3:218b-23: gzhag ste / dam du btsems la /
T13D4312-3:218b-24: de'i 'og tu chings mas dkri zhing gos mthug pos bcing bar bya'o //
T13D4312-3:218b-25: pags pa'i 'ur mthil bcing bas ni //
T13D4312-3:218b-26: phrag ba'i rma la bcing bar bya //
T13D4312-3:218b-28: phrag pa rma byung ba la ni /
T13D4312-3:218b-29: pags pa las 'ur mthil lta bus bcing bar bya'o /
T13D4312-3:218b-30: rlig pa 'phyang la rkang par ni //
T13D4312-3:218b-31: spu gus chu ni gtor nas kyang //
T13D4312-3:218b-32: rlig pa bcug ste ras bal dang //
T13D4312-3:218b-33: bcas pa'i khab kyis btsem par bya //
T13D4312-3:218b-34: 'ur mthil bcings ba byas pa la //
T13D4312-3:218b-35: rked pa nas ni srad bus gdags //
T13D4312-3:218b-37: rlig pa 'phyang bar gyur pa la ni rkang pa chu'i nang du bcug cing mig chus gtor la /
T13D4312-3:218b-38: rlig bslar bcug ste ras bal gyi skud pa dang bcas pa'i khab kyis btsem par bya'o //
T13D4312-3:218b-40: mdo'i gnas las smos pa'i 'ur mthil 'dra ba'i bcing
T13D4312-3:218b-41: bas bcings la rked pa nas chings ma'i srad bus
T13D4312-3:218b-42: brtod par bya'o // der ni rma ni 'drul gyur pas //
T13D4312-3:218b-43: snum dang dugs kyi las mi bya //
T13D4312-3:218b-45: rlig pa 'phyang ba'i rma de la ni snum dang dugs kyi cho ga byar mi rung ste /
T13D4312-3:218b-46: rma 'drul bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
T13D4312-3:219a-2: sug smel dz'a ti bar ba ta //
T13D4312-3:219a-3: dan da ldong ros skyer ba dang //
T13D4312-3:219a-4: sle tres dang ni spangs ma dang //
T13D4312-3:219a-5: til mar bskol bas rma 'tshob byed //
T13D4312-3:219a-7: pri yang ku la sogs pa dang bskol ba'i til
T13D4312-3:219a-8: mar gyis ni rlig pa 'byung ba'i rma 'tshob par
T13D4312-3:219a-10: pri yang ku ni ka ra nu par te /
T13D4312-3:219a-11: la la ni 'dir pri yang ku ma yin gyi
T13D4312-3:219a-12: thal tres nag po kri sna sha rib zhes bya
T13D4312-3:219a-14: yan lag ma lus chad pa la //
T13D4312-3:219a-15: til mar bskol bas bsregs nas ni //
T13D4312-3:219a-16: sgye'u bcing bas bcing bar bya //
T13D4312-3:219a-17: de nas rma ltar gso bar bya //
T13D4312-3:219a-19: lag dar ram byin pa lhag ma ma lus par
T13D4312-3:219a-20: 'ur por chad pa la ni til mar bskol ba'i
T13D4312-3:219a-21: nang du bsregs la sngar bshad pa'i sgye'u bcing ba'i
T13D4312-3:219a-23: de'i 'og tu rma gso ba'i cho gas gso bar bya'o //
T13D4312-3:219a-24: phug pa zug rngu dbyung bas gso //
T13D4312-3:219a-25: grugs dang chag grugs gso par bya //
T13D4312-3:219a-27: phug pa'i rma ni zug rngu dbyung ba'i gso ba
T13D4312-3:219a-28: ji skad sngar mdo'i gnas su bshad pa bzhin gso
T13D4312-3:219a-29: bar bya'o // grugs pa ni chag grugs gso ba'i
T13D4312-3:219a-30: le'u las ji skad smos pa ltar gso bar bya'o
T13D4312-3:219a-31: bar bya'o // // mgo bo'i zug rdu dbyung ba la //
T13D4312-3:219a-32: skra yi ye'u gzhug par bya //

T13D4312-3:225b-3: bdun gyi bar du spangs la nyin re zhing chu
T13D4312-3:225b-4: las bteg ste bskam par bya'o //

T13D4312-3:225b-16: spang spos la sogs pa'i dri'i sman ma lus pa

T13D4312-3:225b-19: dag 'chad do // dri'i sman ma lus pa ni
T13D4312-3:225b-20: ba la la sogs pa'i sde tshan las bshad pa
T13D4312-3:225b-21: dag 'chad do // dang / de bzhin du ga phur la sogs pa'o //
T13D4312-3:225b-22: de ltar btsir ba'i til mar de rdo dreg la
T13D4312-3:225b-23: sogs pa'i lde gu dang yang bskol bar bya ste

T13D4312-3:225b-26: par gyur ba la yang btung ba dang sna nas
T13D4312-3:225b-27: gtang ba la sogs pa'i sbyor ba sna tshogs dag

T13D4312-3:225b-32: phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa bdun ba'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T13D4312-3:225b-34: // / de nas mtshan par rdol gyi le'u bshad par bya'o //
T13D4312-3:225b-36: 'di brtsams pa'i 'grel pa ni 'di yin te /
T13D4312-3:225b-37: mtshan bar rdol ba kha nang du bltas pas zhes
T13D4312-3:225b-38: sngar bshad pa de'i rang gi mtshan nyid bstan par
T13D4312-3:225b-39: bya ba'i phyir le'u 'di brtsams pa yin no //
T13D4312-3:225b-40: glang bo rta la zhon te 'gro //
T13D4312-3:225b-41: gnas dang ma la gsar tsog pur 'dug / gzhang 'brum nad kyi rgyur bshad dang //
T13D4312-3:225b-42: gzhan la 'ang brten par gyur ba dang //
T13D4312-3:225b-43: mi dge smin par gyur pa dang //
T13D4312-3:225b-44: 'phral du dam pa la smad pas //
T13D4312-3:226a-2: rkub kyi phyi 'am nang du ni //
T13D4312-3:226a-3: rma ni sor tshad gnyis sam gcig / sha khrag gnod par gyur las 'byung //
T13D4312-3:226a-4: chu sor gcin gyi gnas nye bar //
T13D4312-3:226a-5: byung bas 'dzag pa'i rang bzhin can //
T13D4312-3:226a-6: de ni mtshan par rdol zhes bya //
T13D4312-3:226a-8: mtshan par rdol gyi rgyu ni glang po dang rta
T13D4312-3:226a-9: la sogs pa la zhon nas 'gro ba la sogs
T13D4312-3:226a-10: pa dang / gzhan yang 'di skye bar byed pa'i rgyu la brten cing gnas par gyur pa dang /
T13D4312-3:226a-11: de bzhin du sdig pa mi dge ba'i las sngon
T13D4312-3:226a-12: chad byas pa'i 'bras bu smin par gyur pa dang
T13D4312-3:226a-13: / de bzhin du 'phral du tshe 'di nyid la
T13D4312-3:226a-14: mchod pa'i gnas dam pa la smod pas phal cher
T13D4312-3:226a-16: rkub kyi phyi 'am nang du rma'i tshad sor gcig
T13D4312-3:226a-17: tsam mam sor gnyis tsam sha dang khrag gi nad
T13D4312-3:226a-19: chu so dang gcin gyi gnas lgang pa dang nye

T13D4312-3:226a-22: kun kyang ma gsos 'drul byed cing //
T13D4312-3:226a-23: mo mtshan chu so gzhang gi bar //
T13D4312-3:226a-24: shas cher 'jig par byed pa dang //
T13D4312-3:226a-25: bshang gci 'phyen dang khu chu ni //
T13D4312-3:226a-26: bu ga'i nang nas rim gyis 'byung //
T13D4312-3:226a-28: mtshan bar rdol gyi nad kun yang gso ba ma byas na 'drul zhing rnag par byed do //
T13D4312-3:226a-29: mo mtshan la sogs pa zhig cing nyams par byed de /
T13D4312-3:226a-30: de dag nyams pas bu ga'i nang nas bshang ba
T13D4312-3:226a-31: la sogs pa rim gyis mang du 'byung bar 'gyur
T13D4312-3:226a-32: ro // nad gzhi re re ldan pa 'dus //
T13D4312-3:226a-33: glo bur ba dang brgyad du bshad //
T13D4312-3:226a-35: mtshan bar rdol gyi nang ni nad gzhi re re las gyur pa gsum dang /
T13D4312-3:226a-36: ldan pa las gyur pa gsum dang /
T13D4312-3:226a-37: 'dus pa las gyur pa gcig dang /
T13D4312-3:226a-38: glo bur ba gcig ste de ltar na brgyad yin no //
T13D4312-3:226a-39: ma smin 'brum bu zhes byar bshad //
T13D4312-3:226a-40: smin ba mtshan bar rdol yin no //
T13D4312-3:226a-42: mtshan bar rdol ba de ma smin pa la ni ming 'brum bu zhes bya bar bshad la /
T13D4312-3:226a-43: smin cing rnags na ni mtshan bar rdol ba zhes bya'o //
T13D4312-3:226a-44: rtsa ba mi mngon nad tshabs che //
T13D4312-3:226b-0: mtshan bar rdol 'gyur shes @226b par bya //
T13D4312-3:226b-1: de las gzhan du de mi byed //
T13D4312-3:226b-3: mtshan par rdol gyi nad gang rtsa ba mi mngon pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can dang /
T13D4312-3:226b-4: rma 'drubs nas kyang slar yang nas yang du rma
T13D4312-3:226b-5: red cing zhig par 'gyur ba ni mtshan bar rdol
T13D4312-3:226b-6: du 'gyur gyi / de las gzhan ba dag ni mtshan par rdol du mi 'gyur ro //
T13D4312-3:226b-7: de la rlung gyur 'brum bu ni //
T13D4312-3:226b-8: dmar zhing gnag lan ba dang //
T13D4312-3:226b-9: zug cing 'phar bar byed pa yin //
T13D4312-3:226b-11: de la rlung las gyur pa'i 'brum bu mdog dmar ba 'am gnag pa dang //
T13D4312-3:226b-12: na ba dang zug pa dang /
T13D4312-3:226b-14: mkhris gyur rnga mo'i mgrin ltar ring //
T13D4312-3:226b-15: dmar zhing srab la shas cher tsha //
T13D4312-3:226b-16: thal mdog dud pa 'thul bcas yin //
T13D4312-3:226b-18: mkhris pa las gyur pa'i 'brum bu ni rnga mo'i mgrin ba ltar ring ba dang /
T13D4312-3:226b-19: dmar ba nas drod che zhing dud pa 'thul blta bu'i bar yin no //
T13D4312-3:226b-20: bad kan las gyur brtan zhing snum //
T13D4312-3:226b-21: rtsa ba che zhing mdog skya g-ya' //
T13D4312-3:226b-23: bad kan las gyur pa'i 'brum bu ni brtan pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can yin no //
T13D4312-3:226b-24: rlung mkhris las gyur mdog gnag cing //
T13D4312-3:226b-25: dmar zhing tsha la mi bzod na //
T13D4312-3:226b-27: rlung dang mkhris pa'i ldang ba las gyur pa'i 'brum
T13D4312-3:226b-28: bu ni mdog gnag pa la sogs pa yin no
T13D4312-3:226b-29: // bad rlung las gyur cung zad gnag / smin par dka' ba'i mtshan nyid can //
T13D4312-3:226b-31: bad kan dang rlung las gyur pa'i 'brum bu la
T13D4312-3:226b-32: ni kha dog cung zad gnag pa la sogs pa

T13D4312-3:226b-36: rims dang slon sogs kyis gnod byed //
T13D4312-3:226b-38: nad gzhi sum char gyur pa'i 'brum bu ni mthe

T13D4312-3:226b-40: no // yal bar bor la smin pa dang //

T13D4312-3:226b-44: bag med pas yal bar bor te ma gsos na

T13D4312-3:227a-29: bad mkhris las gyur sngar bshad pa'i //

T13D4312-3:227a-32: skrang dang tsha ba la sogs skyed //
T13D4312-3:227a-33: de ni myur smin rdol gyur na //
T13D4312-3:227a-34: gzhang 'brum rtsa ba rnag can yin //

T13D4312-3:227b-0: 'di ni gzhang 'brum @227b gyi mtshan bar rdol ba zhes bya'o zhes drang srong rnams kyis bshad do //
T13D4312-3:227b-3: 'di yis gzhang ni zhig byed cing //

T13D4312-3:227b-7: de ni dbyibs dung 'dra ba yin la /
T13D4312-3:227b-8: mtshan par rdol ba 'dis ni mi bzad par nad

T13D4312-3:227b-10: pa yin no // gang tshe sha la brkam pa yis //
T13D4312-3:227b-11: rus pa'i dum bu zos gyur pas //
T13D4312-3:227b-12: thad kar song bas lam log zhugs //
T13D4312-3:227b-13: rdol zhing snad par byed pa yin //
T13D4312-3:227b-14: de tshags pas rnags pa dang //

T13D4312-3:227b-16: der ni srin bu skye 'gyur zhing //
T13D4312-3:227b-17: gzhang ni kun tu za bar byed //
T13D4312-3:227b-18: ring por mi thogs des 'jig byed //
T13D4312-3:227b-19: de ni lam log rma skyes yin //

T13D4312-3:227b-28: srin bu des nad pa de'i gzhang kun tu za bar byed de /

T13D4312-3:227b-33: rma gso ba las shes par bya //

T13D4312-3:227b-36: tsha ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma ni rma gso

T13D4312-3:227b-44: re re las gyur pa gsum dang ldan pa las
T13D4312-3:227b-46: drug ni gso dka' ba yin no //
T13D4312-3:228a-1: rma las skyes pa ni spang bar bya'o //
T13D4312-3:228a-2: de bzhin du phyir sel ba'i gnyer mar phyin pa yang spang bar bya la /
T13D4312-3:228a-3: de bzhin du mdoms kyi srubs mtshams la brten pa yang spang bar bya'o //
T13D4312-3:228a-4: de nas 'brum bu'i tshe nyid ni //
T13D4312-3:228a-6: sbyang dang gtar ga chu blugs sogs //

T13D4312-3:228a-10: de nas mtshan par rdol 'di 'brum bu'i tshe nyid
T13D4312-3:228a-11: ni sbyang ba la sogs pas gso bar bya zhing
T13D4312-3:228a-12: ci nas kyang smin par mi 'gyur ba de ltar

T13D4312-3:228a-14: dugs byas nas ni lus spying bya //
T13D4312-3:228a-15: gzhang 'brum lta bur bsdams nas ni //

T13D4312-3:228a-18: phyi bltas nang du bltas pa brtag / ces bya ba la /

T13D4312-3:228a-20: gzhang 'brum lta bur legs par bsdams nas steng du

T13D4312-3:228a-23: nang du bltas pa legs par brtag cing shes par bya'o //
T13D4312-3:228a-24: de la nang bltas btsal nas ni ;

T13D4312-3:228a-26: phyir bltas ma lus par bcad la //
T13D4312-3:228a-27: thal sman dag gis gso bar bya //
T13D4312-3:228a-29: de las mtshan bar rdol ba nang du bltas pa
T13D4312-3:228a-30: ni legs par btsal cing brtags nas gtsags bus gcad
T13D4312-3:228a-32: phyi rol du bltas pa ni mtshan par rdol ba ma lus par bcad la /
T13D4312-3:228a-33: de'i 'og tu thal sman gyis gso bar bya'o //
T13D4312-3:228a-34: de nas thal sman btab pa 'am //
T13D4312-3:228a-35: yang na sman pas me btsa' gdab //
T13D4312-3:228a-37: de'i 'og tu mtshan bar rdol gnyi ga yang sman pas thal sman gyis gso ba'am /
T13D4312-3:228a-39: rnga mo'i mgrin la thal sman bsku //
T13D4312-3:228a-41: rnga mo'i mgrin pa lta bu zhes bya ba'i mtshan
T13D4312-3:228a-42: bar rdol ni thal sman nyid kyis gso bar bya'o
T13D4312-3:228a-43: // me btsas ni ma yin no //

T13D4312-3:228b-0: @228b bcug nas legs par gcad bar bya //

T13D4312-3:228b-14: ba'i mtshan bar rdol la yang thal sman dang ba
T13D4312-3:228b-15: gcin dang / sbu gu'i sbyor bas gso bar bya'o //
T13D4312-3:228b-16: gzhang 'brum mtshan mar rdol la sngar //
T13D4312-3:228b-17: gzhang 'brum la ni sman phye gdab //
T13D4312-3:228b-18: rma skyes pa la re thag bcad //
T13D4312-3:228b-19: zug rngu dbyung ba'i cho ga bzhin //

T13D4312-3:228b-21: bza' dang byug pa sbyar bar bya //
T13D4312-3:228b-23: gzhang 'brum las gyur pa'i mtshan bar rdol ba la ni dang por gzhang 'brum nyid gso bar bya'o //
T13D4312-3:228b-24: rma las skyes pa'i mtshan bar rdol la ni dang por re thag bcad la /
T13D4312-3:228b-25: de'i 'og tu zug rngu dbyung pa'i cho ga bzhin du gso bar bya ste /
T13D4312-3:228b-26: de'i 'og tu 'bu 'joms pa'i bza' btung dang bsku byug sbyar bar bya'o //
T13D4312-3:228b-27: glan dug sa sbu gu can la sogs //
T13D4312-3:228b-28: snum chos legs sbyar nad la phan //
T13D4312-3:228b-30: mtshan bar rdol gyi nad na ba la ni glan pa'i dugs la sogs pas phan no //
T13D4312-3:228b-31: ko tshags 'dra dang thams cad la //
T13D4312-3:228b-32: ba lang ngogs dang kun tu bzang //
T13D4312-3:228b-33: gshol phyed pa dang gshol gyis bya //
T13D4312-3:228b-34: brtags te nye bar sbyar bar bya //
T13D4312-3:228b-36: ko tshags 'dra ba dang mtshan bar rdol ba thams
T13D4312-3:228b-37: cad la ba lang gi ngogs zhes bya ba la
T13D4312-3:228b-38: sogs pa spyad bzhi po nges par brtags te sbyar
T13D4312-3:228b-39: bar bya'o // ngos su 'debs par byed pa'i mtshon //
T13D4312-3:228b-40: ba lang ngogs zhes bya bar bshad //
T13D4312-3:228b-42: ngos su mtshon gang ngos su 'debs shing gcod par
T13D4312-3:228b-43: byed pa de ni ming ba lang gi ngogs zhes
T13D4312-3:229a-3: thams cad gtong zhing spyod pa'i cha spyad ni kun tu bzang po zhes bya'o //
T13D4312-3:229a-4: ngos la gcod ba gshol phyed pa //
T13D4312-3:229a-5: ngos gnyis su ni gshol gyis bcad //
T13D4312-3:229a-7: ngos phan tshun gcig gcod par byed pa'i cha spyad ni gshol phyed ba zhes bya'o //
T13D4312-3:229a-8: ngos gnyis kar gcod par byed pa ni gshol zhes drang srong rnams kyis bshad do //
T13D4312-3:229a-9: 'dzag pa'i lam ni ma lus pa //
T13D4312-3:229a-10: thams cad me yis bsreg par bya //
T13D4312-3:229a-11: slar yang 'di lta'i gnod mi skyed //
T13D4312-3:229a-13: 'dzag par byed pa'i lam ma lus pa thams cad la yang mes bsreg par bya ste /
T13D4312-3:229a-14: de ltar byas na mtshan bar rdol gyis slar gnod par mi byed do //
T13D4312-3:229a-15: sman pas de yi bar bar du //
T13D4312-3:229a-16: de lto sbyang la 'bad bar bya //
T13D4312-3:229a-18: yang mtshan bar rdol dang ldan pa'i nad pa de la bar bar ram /
T13D4312-3:229a-19: skabs skabs su skyug sman la sogs pas sbyang bar bya'o //
T13D4312-3:229a-20: byi la'i rus pa 'bras bu gsum //
T13D4312-3:229a-21: khu ba lde gur byas pas bsku //
T13D4312-3:229a-23: mtshan bar rdol la byi la'i rus pa la sogs pa'i lde gus bskus na yang phan no //
T13D4312-3:229a-24: dzo ti smra ti ma la yu //
T13D4312-3:229a-25: sle sman ta ka bi sha lya //
T13D4312-3:229a-26: dur byid pa ti ba tra ka //
T13D4312-3:229a-27: ka ra b'i ra sra rtsi pog / shu dag su dh'akshi ra dang //
T13D4312-3:229a-28: aa rka'i lo ma til mar bskol //
T13D4312-3:229a-29: mtshan bar rdol la bskus na ni //
T13D4312-3:229a-30: 'di ni phan byed mchog tu bshad //
T13D4312-3:229a-32: dzo ti sma til sogs pa'i lde gu dang til mar bskol la /
T13D4312-3:229a-33: til mar de mtshan bar rdol ba'i nad dang ldan
T13D4312-3:229a-34: pa la bskus na yang mchog tu phan pa yin
T13D4312-3:229a-35: no // dzo ti sma ti ni ka ka da na'o //
T13D4312-3:229a-36: ma la yu ni so ma ra dza 'am phal gu'o //
T13D4312-3:229a-37: sle sman ta ka ni se lu'o //
T13D4312-3:229a-38: bi sha lya ni lang ga li'o //
T13D4312-3:229a-39: dur byid ni tri byid do //
T13D4312-3:229a-40: shing mngar sing phrom pi pi ling //
T13D4312-3:229a-41: sug smel ha re nu ka dang //
T13D4312-3:229a-42: ser po gnyis dang pri yang ku //
T13D4312-3:229a-43: rgyam tsha thal tres shug ba dang //
T13D4312-3:229a-44: padma'i snying po da ta ki //
T13D4312-3:229a-45: spra tshil ru rta sra rtsi pog / kha lung 'o mar bcas pa dang //
T13D4312-3:229a-46: til mar lhan cig bskol ba yis //
T13D4312-3:229a-47: bskus na 'brum bu mdze dang rma //
T13D4312-3:229b-2: shing mngar la sogs pa'i sman lde gu byas pa dang /
T13D4312-3:229b-3: til mar lhan cig bskol bas bskus na 'brum bu la sogs pa'i nad sel bar byed do /
T13D4312-3:229b-4: byi dang ga snying 'bras bu gsum //
T13D4312-3:229b-5: pi pi ling rtsa pi pi ling //
T13D4312-3:229b-6: sbrang rtsi til mar sbyar ba yi //
T13D4312-3:229b-7: lde gu zos na srin bu'i nad //
T13D4312-3:229b-8: mtshan bar rdol dang mdze nad dang //
T13D4312-3:229b-9: gcin snyi ba dang smas pa dang //
T13D4312-3:229b-12: byi dang ga'i snying po la sogs pa'i lde gu
T13D4312-3:229b-13: zos na srin bu'i nad la sogs pa sel bar
T13D4312-3:229b-14: byed do // sle tres sug smel byi dang ga / dug mo nyung ba ru ra //
T13D4312-3:229b-15: skyu ru ra dang aa ru ra //
T13D4312-3:229b-16: gu gul rim gyis cha nges bskyed //
T13D4312-3:229b-17: sbrang rtsir sbyar ba 'di zos na //
T13D4312-3:229b-18: 'brum bu sbom dang mtshan bar rdol //
T13D4312-3:229b-19: nad ni sel bar byed pa yin //
T13D4312-3:229b-21: sle tres la sogs pa'i sman cha re res bskyed
T13D4312-3:229b-22: de sbyar ba'i lde gu zos na 'brum bu sngon
T13D4312-3:229b-23: po la sogs pa'i nad sel bar byed do //
T13D4312-3:229b-24: pi pi ling dang tsi tra ka / byi dang ga dang dug mo nyung //
T13D4312-3:229b-25: cha snyoms phyed kyi 'bras bu gsum //
T13D4312-3:229b-26: kun dang cha mnyam gu gul dang //
T13D4312-3:229b-27: sbrang rtsir sbyar ba'i lde gu yis //
T13D4312-3:229b-28: nad ni thams cad 'joms par byed //
T13D4312-3:229b-30: pi pi ling la sogs pa srang re dang /
T13D4312-3:229b-32: gu gul sman de dag kun dang cha mnyam par byas pa dang /
T13D4312-3:229b-33: sbrang rtsir sbyar ba'i lde gu tshad dang ldan par
T13D4312-3:229b-34: zos na yang mtshan bar rdol ba'i nad thams cad
T13D4312-3:229b-36: gu gul srang lnga pi pi ling //
T13D4312-3:229b-37: 'bras bu gsum ni srang re dang //
T13D4312-3:229b-38: shing tsha sug smel zho gnyis gnyis //
T13D4312-3:229b-39: sbrang rtsir sbyar ba'i lde gu ni //
T13D4312-3:229b-40: zos na mtshan bar rdol ba dang //
T13D4312-3:229b-41: mdze dang skran nad 'joms par byed //
T13D4312-3:229b-44: pi pi ling 'bras bu gsum sman sna re zhing srang re /
T13D4312-3:229b-46: sug smel sna re zhing zho gnyis gnyis sbrang rtsi
T13D4312-3:229b-47: dang sbyar ba'i lde gu zos na yang mtshan par
T13D4312-3:229b-48: rdol ba la sogs pa'i nad sel bar byed do
T13D4312-3:229b-49: // de nyid dang ni bca' sga'i phye //
T13D4312-3:230a-2: rtsa ba bcu yi khu bar bsres //
T13D4312-3:230a-3: mchog tu rlung gi nad sel byed //
T13D4312-3:230a-5: bshad ma thag pa'i sman de dag nyid bca' ska'i
T13D4312-3:230a-6: phye ma la sogs pa dang bsres pas kyang mchog
T13D4312-3:230a-7: tu rlung las gyur pa'i mtshan bar rdol bsel bar
T13D4312-3:230a-8: byed do // seng ldeng snying po 'bras bu gsum gyi phye //
T13D4312-3:230a-9: aa san bskol khu ba dang bsres dang //
T13D4312-3:230a-10: cha mnyam gu gul sbrang rtsi lde gur byas //
T13D4312-3:230a-11: mdze 'brum gcin snyi mtshan bar rdol nad sel //
T13D4312-3:230a-13: seng ldeng gi snying po la sogs pa dang /
T13D4312-3:230a-14: gu gul cha mnyam par aa sa na bskol ba'i
T13D4312-3:230a-15: khu ba dang bsres te zos na mdze la sogs
T13D4312-3:230a-17: 'di ni mtshan bar rdol gso'i bye brag bshad //
T13D4312-3:230a-18: sman gyi mtshan nyid lhag ma gang yin pa //
T13D4312-3:230a-19: rma yi dbang byas yongs su bstan pa dang //
T13D4312-3:230a-20: gso thabs dgos pa legs par brtags te sbyar //
T13D4312-3:230a-22: sngar bshad pa'i mtshan bar rdol gyi gso ba bye brag gam khyad par tsam smras pa yin gyi /
T13D4312-3:230a-23: spyi'i bshad pa ni ma yin te /
T13D4312-3:230a-24: sngon gyi mtshan nyid de la phan pa lhag ma
T13D4312-3:230a-25: gang yin pa ni rma'i dbang du byas pa yongs
T13D4312-3:230a-26: su brtags te bstan pa dang /
T13D4312-3:230a-27: de dang 'tsham pa'i gso thabs gang yin pa dag gis gso bar bya'o //
T13D4312-3:230a-28: rta zhon stobs 'gyed shugs ni 'gegs pa dang //
T13D4312-3:230a-29: chang 'thungs nyal po ma zhu ma goms dang //
T13D4312-3:230a-30: drag shul las ni sna tshogs rma 'drubs nas //
T13D4312-3:230a-31: lo gcig bar ram de las lhag pa spangs //
T13D4312-3:230a-33: mtshan bar rdol gyi rma 'tshobs su zin kyang /
T13D4312-3:230a-34: rta zhon pa la sogs pa lo gcig gam /
T13D4312-3:230a-35: de las lhag pa'i bar du yongs su spang bar bya'o //
T13D4312-3:230a-36: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba /
T13D4312-3:230a-37: slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges bar sbyar ba las /
T13D4312-3:230a-38: phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T13D4312-3:230a-40: // / de nas rmen bu dang thor bu dang rkang
T13D4312-3:230a-41: bam dang 'bras kyi phreng ba'i nad dmigs shes pa
T13D4312-3:230a-42: bshad par bya'o // zhes bya ba la /
T13D4312-3:230b-0: rma dang 'brum bu'i skabs kyi go @230b rims kyis na le'u 'di nyid brtsams pa yin no //
T13D4312-3:230b-1: nad ni bad kan shas che ba //
T13D4312-3:230b-2: khrag dang sha dang tshil la brten //
T13D4312-3:230b-3: zlum zhing mtho bar skrangs pa de //
T13D4312-3:230b-4: mdud pa 'dra bas rmen bur bshad //
T13D4312-3:230b-6: rlung la sogs pa'i nad bad kan gyi shas che
T13D4312-3:230b-7: ba gang yin pa sha dang khrag la brten cing
T13D4312-3:230b-8: gnas pa de [?] las skrangs pa gang zlum zhing
T13D4312-3:230b-9: mtho bar gyur pa de rnag 'dzag pa'i rjes la
T13D4312-3:230b-10: mdud pa 'dra ba'i rmen bus khyab par 'gyur bas
T13D4312-3:230b-11: de la ming rmen bu zhes bya'o //
T13D4312-3:230b-12: de ni nad gzhi khrag sha tshil //
T13D4312-3:230b-13: rus rtsa rma las gyur pa dgu //
T13D4312-3:230b-15: rmen bu de ni nang gzhi so so las gyur pa gsum dang /
T13D4312-3:230b-17: sha dang tshil dang rus pa dang rtsa dang /
T13D4312-3:230b-18: rma las gyur pa dang dgu'o //
T13D4312-3:230b-19: de la rlung gyur rgya che zhing //
T13D4312-3:230b-20: brug cing bye ba snyam sems na //
T13D4312-3:230b-21: gnas nas gnas gzhan dag tu 'pho //
T13D4312-3:230b-23: 'jam zhing lgang pa lta bur rgyas //
T13D4312-3:230b-24: brtol na khrag ni sla bar 'dzag / ces bya ba la /
T13D4312-3:230b-25: de la rmen bu de dag gi nang nas rlung
T13D4312-3:230b-26: las gyur pa'i rmen bu ni rgya che zhing lhun
T13D4312-3:230b-27: mthug pa dang / zug pa la sogs pa nas /
T13D4312-3:230b-28: khrag sla ba 'dzag pa'i bar du yin no //
T13D4312-3:230b-29: mkhris gyur tsha zhing mdog ser la //
T13D4312-3:230b-30: dmar zhing myur du smin pa yin //
T13D4312-3:230b-31: brtol na khrag ni dron mo 'dzag / ces bya ba la /
T13D4312-3:230b-32: mkhris pa las gyur pa'i rmen bu ni tsha ba
T13D4312-3:230b-33: dang bcas pa dang kha dog ser po yin la
T13D4312-3:230b-34: / de bzhin dmar ba la sogs pa yin no //
T13D4312-3:230b-35: bad kan las gyur nad med sra //
T13D4312-3:230b-36: reg na grang zhing dkar la g-ya' //
T13D4312-3:230b-37: smin na rnag ni ska ba 'jag / ces bya ba la /
T13D4312-3:230b-38: bad kan las gyur pa'i rmen bu ni nad tshabs
T13D4312-3:230b-39: chung zhing reg na grang ba la sogs pa yin
T13D4312-3:230b-40: no // nad 'khrugs khrag las gyur rmen bu //
T13D4312-3:230b-41: srin bu dang ni bcas par 'gyur //
T13D4312-3:230b-42: sha dang rtsa la gnas pa yi //
T13D4312-3:230b-43: rmen bu tshor ba chung ba dang //
T13D4312-3:230b-44: mkhris pa'i mtshan nyid 'dra ba yin //
T13D4312-3:230b-46: rlung la sogs pa'i nad 'khrugs pa'i khrag las rmen
T13D4312-3:230b-47: bur gyur pa ni khrag de srin bu skye ba
T13D4312-3:230b-48: la phyogs par 'gyur ba dang bcas pa dang /
T13D4312-3:231a-1: pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yin no //
T13D4312-3:231a-2: sha che'i gnod gyur sha las ni //
T13D4312-3:231a-3: sha skyed zas la rmen bu 'byung //
T13D4312-3:231a-4: snum zhing che la sra ba dang //
T13D4312-3:231a-5: rtsa yis khyab cing bad kan 'dra //
T13D4312-3:231a-7: sha skyed par byed pa'i kha zas kyis sha la
T13D4312-3:231a-8: gnod par gyur pa las byung ba'i rmen bu ni
T13D4312-3:231a-9: snum pa nas bad kan dang mtshan nyid 'dra ba'i
T13D4312-3:231a-10: bar yin no // tshil skyed pa yis tshil 'phel ba //
T13D4312-3:231a-11: sha 'am pags par phyin gyur ba //
T13D4312-3:231a-12: rlung gi rmen bu shin tu snum //
T13D4312-3:231a-13: 'jam dang brtan par byed pa yin //
T13D4312-3:231a-14: bad kan dang ni mtshan nyid mtshungs //
T13D4312-3:231a-16: de brtol tshil mthug dmar ba dang //
T13D4312-3:231a-19: tshil skyed par byed pa'i kha zas kyis tshil 'phel
T13D4312-3:231a-20: bar 'gyur ba sha'am pags par phyin par rgyur pa
T13D4312-3:231a-21: las rlung gi rmen du shin tu snum pa la
T13D4312-3:231a-22: sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can lus 'phel zhing tshon ni
T13D4312-3:231a-25: de brtol na tshil mthug cing mdog dmar ba la sogs pa 'dzag par 'gyur ro //
T13D4312-3:231a-26: rus pa chag dang snad pa las //
T13D4312-3:231a-27: mtho dang dma' bar gyur pa de //
T13D4312-3:231a-28: rus pa'i rmen bu zhes bya'o //
T13D4312-3:231a-30: rus pa chag grugs su gyur pa las rus pa
T13D4312-3:231a-31: gang mtho ba 'am dma' bar gyur pa de ni
T13D4312-3:231a-32: rus pa'i rmen bu zhes bya'o //
T13D4312-3:231a-33: rkang gis song ba 'am drag shul gyis //
T13D4312-3:231a-34: dub par gyur nas chu brgal bas //
T13D4312-3:231a-35: rlung gis rtsa grang khrag bcas pa //
T13D4312-3:231a-36: rlung gis btsir te 'khrugs nas ni //
T13D4312-3:231a-37: yon por byas te skams pa dang //
T13D4312-3:231a-38: mi 'phar nang byung rmen bu chags //
T13D4312-3:231a-39: de ni rtsa yi rmen bur bshad //
T13D4312-3:231a-41: rkang gis lam du zhugs pa las 'phral du chu brgal bar gyur pa dang /
T13D4312-3:231a-42: yang na de bzhin du drag shul gyis dub par
T13D4312-3:231a-43: gyur pa las mod la chu brgal bar gyur pas
T13D4312-3:231a-45: rlung des rtsa la gnod par byas shing btsir te
T13D4312-3:231a-46: 'khums par byas shing skams ba las mi 'phar bar
T13D4312-3:231a-47: nad byung ba'i rmen bu chags bar 'gyur te de
T13D4312-3:231b-0: ni ming rtsa'i rmen bu @231b zhes bya'o //
T13D4312-3:231b-1: rma ni ma 'drubs 'drubs ma thag / ro ni thams cad zos gyur pa 'am //
T13D4312-3:231b-2: rlon pa dkris pa med pa 'am //
T13D4312-3:231b-3: yang na lus ni snad gyur pas //
T13D4312-3:231b-4: rlung ni nad khrag ma phyung ba //
T13D4312-3:231b-5: ma sbyangs rma ni bsrubs pa las //
T13D4312-3:231b-6: tsha zhing g-ya' dang bcas gyur pa //
T13D4312-3:231b-7: rma yi rmen bur de bshad do //
T13D4312-3:231b-10: 'drubs ma thag ro thams cad dang zas 'chol bar zos pa 'am /
T13D4312-3:231b-11: yang na rma rlon pa dkris ma med par gzhag pa 'am /
T13D4312-3:231b-12: yang na lus snad par gyur pas rlung 'khrugs par
T13D4312-3:231b-13: gyur nas nad khrag ma phyung ba 'am ma sbyangs
T13D4312-3:231b-14: par gyur pa las rma bsrubs shing 'tshobs pa las
T13D4312-3:231b-15: ni tsha zhing g-ya' ba dang bcas pa'i rmen bur
T13D4312-3:231b-16: 'gyur te / de ni rma'i rmen bu zhes drang srong dag gis bshad do //
T13D4312-3:231b-17: gsor rung nad gzhi khrag tshil gyur //
T13D4312-3:231b-19: rmen bu de dag las gsor rung ba ni rlung
T13D4312-3:231b-20: dang mkhris pa dang bad kan dang khrag dang tshil
T13D4312-3:231b-23: sra zhing 'gyur dang sbom pa dang //
T13D4312-3:231b-24: gnad dang mgul pa ltor gnas yin //
T13D4312-3:231b-26: rmen bu gang sra bar 'gyur zhing g-ya' ba dang /
T13D4312-3:231b-27: sbom pa la sogs pa ni gsor mi rung ba yin no //
T13D4312-3:231b-28: mdud pa cher chags thor bu ste //
T13D4312-3:231b-29: rmen bu de yi mtshan nyid can //
T13D4312-3:231b-30: nad gzhi la sogs gyur drug yin //
T13D4312-3:231b-31: phal cher bad kan tshil rgyas yin //
T13D4312-3:231b-32: brtan pas smin par mi 'gyur ro //
T13D4312-3:231b-34: sngar bshad pa'i rmen bu las chen por gyur pa
T13D4312-3:231b-35: gang yin pa de ni thor bu zhes bya ste
T13D4312-3:231b-36: / de yang rmen bu'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yin la /
T13D4312-3:231b-37: de yang nad gzhi tha dad pa dang /
T13D4312-3:231b-38: tshil las gyur pa'i bar rnam pa drug yod la /
T13D4312-3:231b-39: de yang phal cher bad kan dang tshil rgyas pa yin pa'i phyir dang /
T13D4312-3:231b-40: brtan zhing sra bas smin par mi 'gyur ro //
T13D4312-3:231b-41: rtsa la gnas pa'i khrag nad kyis //
T13D4312-3:231b-43: smin pa de tshe rgyas par 'gyur //
T13D4312-3:231b-44: sha yi gong po bcas par 'gyur //
T13D4312-3:231b-45: sha yi myu gus khyab gyur zhing //
T13D4312-3:231b-46: skyes pa de las nad khrag ni //
T13D4312-3:232a-1: par mang du 'dzag / de ni khrag gi thor bu yin //
T13D4312-3:232a-3: rtsa la gnas pa'i khrag ni nad khrag rlung la
T13D4312-3:232a-4: sogs pa'i nad kyis 'khums par gyur pa na khrag
T13D4312-3:232a-6: sha'i gong po ril po dang bcas par 'gyur ba dang /
T13D4312-3:232a-7: sha'i myu gus khyab cing de 'phel bar gyur pa
T13D4312-3:232a-8: las khrag gi rgyun mang po rgyun du 'dzag pa
T13D4312-3:232a-9: yin te / de ni khrag gi thor bu zhes bya'o //
T13D4312-3:232a-10: de las sha khrag las gyur sbang //
T13D4312-3:232a-11: bzhi po gzhan dag gso bar bya //
T13D4312-3:232a-13: thor bu de dag gi nang nas khrag dang sha
T13D4312-3:232a-14: las gyur pa'i thor bu gnyis po ni spang bar
T13D4312-3:232a-15: bya la / rlung las gyur pa la sogs pa bzhi po ni gso bar bya'o //
T13D4312-3:232a-16: dang por chu sor gnas pa'am //
T13D4312-3:232a-17: ro smad la brten bad kan rgyas //
T13D4312-3:232a-18: sha khrag nad kyis rkang par ni //

T13D4312-3:232a-20: rim gyis stug po nyid du 'gyur //

T13D4312-3:232a-23: bad kan gyi shas che ba'i nad dang por chu

T13D4312-3:232a-28: rlung gyur gas shing gnag pa dang //
T13D4312-3:232a-29: rgyu med na zhing rtsub cing na //
T13D4312-3:232a-31: rlung las gyur pa'i rkang bam ni rkang pa gas par byed pa dang /

T13D4312-3:232a-33: mkhris pa las gyur ser ba dang //
T13D4312-3:232a-34: tsha dang rims kyis 'debs pa yin //
T13D4312-3:232a-36: mkhris pa las gyur ba'i rkang bam ni tsha ba mdog ser ba la sogs pa yin no //
T13D4312-3:232a-37: bad kan snum lci nad tshabs chung //
T13D4312-3:232a-38: sha yi mdzer pa chen pos khyab //
T13D4312-3:232a-40: bad kan las gyur pa'i rkang bam ni snum pa dang lci ba la sogs pa yin no//
T13D4312-3:232a-41: de ni mang du 'dzag pa dang //
T13D4312-3:232a-42: lo gcig 'das pa spang bar bya //
T13D4312-3:232a-44: rkang bam gyi nad de ni chu ser mang du 'dzag pa dang /
T13D4312-3:232a-45: lo gcig lon pa'i rnying pa spang bar bya'o //
T13D4312-3:232a-46: kha cig lag pa sna dang mchu //
T13D4312-3:232a-47: rna ba rkang pa ltar 'byung gzer //
T13D4312-3:232b-2: rlan can gnas su mi bzad skye //
T13D4312-3:232b-4: drang srong la la ni lag pa gnyis dang sna
T13D4312-3:232b-5: dang mchu dang rna ba dang rkang pa dang 'dra
T13D4312-3:232b-6: bar rkang bam 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes zer la
T13D4312-3:232b-7: / rkang bam gyi nad de ni rlan can gyi
T13D4312-3:232b-8: gnas su yang dang yang du shas cher skye bar
T13D4312-3:232b-9: / 'gyur ro // nad ni tshil mgrin mjing pa

T13D4312-3:232b-11: mdog 'dra sra zhing snum pa dang //
T13D4312-3:232b-12: par ta skyu ru ra 'dra dang //

T13D4312-3:232b-16: rlung la sogs pa'i nad tshil la gnas shing mgrin
T13D4312-3:232b-17: pa dang mjing pa la sogs par brten pa dag
T13D4312-3:232b-18: ni mdog 'dra zhing sra ba la sogs pa'i mtshan
T13D4312-3:232b-19: nyid dang ldan pa bar ta ka'am /
T13D4312-3:232b-20: skyu ru ra 'dra ba gting zug cing nang du
T13D4312-3:232b-21: chud pa'i 'bras chen po 'byung zhing dus yun ring
T13D4312-3:232b-22: zhig lon na smin par byed pa yin no //
T13D4312-3:232b-23: de las kha cig nad med smin //
T13D4312-3:232b-24: kha cig 'dzag dang g-ya' ba yin /
T13D4312-3:232b-25: kha cig skam zhing kha cig skye //
T13D4312-3:232b-26: yun ring du ni gnas par byed //
T13D4312-3:232b-30: 'bras kyi nad de kha cig ni nad chen po med par smin par gyur la /
T13D4312-3:232b-31: kha cig ni g-ya' bar byed pa yin la /
T13D4312-3:232b-32: kha cig ni skam zhing 'dzag / kha cig ni skye zhing 'byung bar byed de /
T13D4312-3:232b-33: de dag kyang yun ring du gnas par byed pa dang /
T13D4312-3:232b-34: rtsa d'ur ba dang 'dra bar 'phel zhing rgyas par byed de /
T13D4312-3:232b-35: ji ltar d'ur ba ni 'bri bar gyur nas slar 'phel bar 'gyur te /
T13D4312-3:232b-36: 'bras kyi phreng ba yang de dang 'dra'o //
T13D4312-3:232b-37: de yang 'brum chen dang 'bras kyi phreng ba zhes bya ba ste /
T13D4312-3:232b-38: ming gnyis thob par 'gyur pa yin no //
T13D4312-3:232b-39: de ni rims bcas skyugs pa dang //
T13D4312-3:232b-40: cham lud rtsi ba logs zug pa sbang //
T13D4312-3:232b-42: 'bras kyi phreng ba de rims la sogs pa'i bla brnan dang bcas pa spang bar bya'o //
T13D4312-3:232b-43: rma la mi 'phrod bsten pa yis //
T13D4312-3:232b-44: skra dang smin pa khyad par med //
T13D4312-3:232b-45: sha sogs nang du rnag zhugs 'gyur //

T13D4312-3:232b-48: sbubs ltar 'dzag pa sbu gu yin //
T13D4312-3:233a-0: @233a * // smin pa dang ma smin pa khyad par rma la

T13D4312-3:233a-24: ser dro rnag ni dri mnam 'dzag / nyin par lhag par 'dzag pa yin //
T13D4312-3:233a-26: mkhris pa las gyur pa ni skom dad che ba dang ;
T13D4312-3:233a-27: tsha ba la sogs pa dang ldan pa yin no //

T13D4312-3:233a-29: mtshan mo lhag par 'dzag pa yin //
T13D4312-3:233a-31: bad kan las gyur ba ni ska zhing spyi bag
T13D4312-3:233a-32: 'dzag pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can yin no
T13D4312-3:233a-33: // 'dus gyur mtshan ma kun ldan spang //
T13D4312-3:233a-35: 'dus pa las gyur ba ni nad gzhi sum char gyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa yin te /
T13D4312-3:233a-36: de ni gsor mi rung bas spang bar bya ba yin no //
T13D4312-3:233a-37: nang na gnas pa'i zug rngu ma phyung zhing //
T13D4312-3:233a-38: sbu gu skyed par byed pa gang yin de //
T13D4312-3:233a-39: lbu ba can la sla zhing dro ba dang //

T13D4312-3:233a-43: sbu gu de ni nad pa de la lbu ba

T13D4312-3:233b-5: // / de nas rmen bu la sogs pa'i nad gso ba bshad par bya'o //

T13D4312-3:234a-14: rim gyis dkris te tog lcags la sogs pa bsregs

T13D4312-3:234b-0: 'o ma dang sbyar kha zas @234b sbyin ;

T13D4312-3:234b-15: de bzhin du mkhris ba sel ba'i zas dang sman la sogs pa thams cad sbyar bar bya'o //

T13D4312-3:269a-31: sdig pas zin pa'i sman mchog yin //
T13D4312-3:269a-33: yang phug ron gyi rtug pa la sogs pa yang mchog tu phan pa yin no //
T13D4312-3:269a-34: rnga mo'i so ni chu bal bcas //
T13D4312-3:269a-35: sdig pa'i dug ni 'joms par byed //
T13D4312-3:269a-37: yang na rnga mo'i so la sogs pa yang phan no //
T13D4312-3:269a-38: shing kun pa la kha lung gi / khu ba dang sbyar lde gu dang //
T13D4312-3:269a-39: mig sman ri lur byas na ni //
T13D4312-3:269a-40: sdig pa'i dug ni sel mchog yin //
T13D4312-3:269a-42: yang na shing kun la sogs pa'i sman gyi sbyor bas phan no //
T13D4312-3:269a-44: gi ri karni se lu dang //
T13D4312-3:269a-45: shir sha'i me tog dug mo yungs //
T13D4312-3:269a-46: zho ga chu dang btags bskus na //
T13D4312-3:269a-47: sdig pa'i dug ni sel bar byed //
T13D4312-3:269a-49: yang na ka ranydza la sogs pa'i sbyor ba yang phan no //
T13D4312-3:269a-50: gang zhig rmugs shing rngam pa 'thon //
T13D4312-3:269a-51: bla zhing mi bzad na gyur pa //
T13D4312-3:269a-52: de la yung dang aa ru ra //
T13D4312-3:269a-53: btsod dang bong nga pi pi ling //
T13D4312-3:269a-54: bil ba gzhon nu na le sham //
T13D4312-3:269b-0: ba'a @269b ta ka yi khu bar btags //
T13D4312-3:269b-1: lde gus byugs na phan pa yin //
T13D4312-3:269b-3: mi gang sems rmugs pa dang /
T13D4312-3:269b-6: 'brel pa'i tshig mang du smra ba dang /
T13D4312-3:269b-7: brnag par dka' ba na bar gyur pa gang yin
T13D4312-3:269b-8: pa de la yung ba la sogs pa'i lde gus
T13D4312-3:269b-9: bsku bar bya'o // sbrang ma gdug pa'i dug kun la //
T13D4312-3:269b-10: zho dang mar ni blud bya zhing //
T13D4312-3:269b-11: gtar ga gdab cing sna sman dang //
T13D4312-3:269b-12: mig sman gyi ni cho ga bya //
T13D4312-3:269b-13: dro zhing snum dang skyur ba dang //
T13D4312-3:269b-14: rlung 'joms kha zas sbyin par bya //
T13D4312-3:269b-16: sbrang ma gdug pa'i dug gis zin pa la ni
T13D4312-3:269b-17: zho dang mar blud pa la sogs pa'i sbyor ba
T13D4312-3:269b-18: dang / kha zas dro ba la sogs pa rlung sel ba sbyin par bya'o //
T13D4312-3:269b-19: dong gra byi ba'i rtug pa dang //
T13D4312-3:269b-20: kha lung khu bab [?] bla dang //
T13D4312-3:269b-21: rgyam tsha pu shel tse sbyar ba'i //
T13D4312-3:269b-22: lde gus sbrang ma'i dug myur 'joms //
T13D4312-3:269b-24: dong gra la sogs pa'i lde gus bskus na sbrang
T13D4312-3:269b-25: ma gdug pa'i rigs thams cad kyi dug 'joms par
T13D4312-3:269b-26: byed do // sdig pas zin pa'i tha mar ni //
T13D4312-3:269b-27: dug ni shas cher langs gyur pa //
T13D4312-3:269b-28: zin pa'i rma la dug gis bsku //
T13D4312-3:269b-31: sdig pas zin pa'i mi la gso ba thams cad
T13D4312-3:269b-32: byas pa'i tha mar dug mi bzad pa langs par
T13D4312-3:269b-33: gyur na rma de la dug gis bsku bar bya'o
T13D4312-3:269b-34: // autstshe tim ka zhes bya ba'i 'bus zin pa yang cho ga 'di nyid bya'o //
T13D4312-3:269b-35: glang po che yi rtug pa'i steng //
T13D4312-3:269b-36: ro hi sha'i rtsa se'u'i chu //
T13D4312-3:269b-37: lde gur byas btags bskus na ni //
T13D4312-3:269b-38: 'di ni sbrang ma'i dug 'joms mchog / ces bya ba la ;
T13D4312-3:269b-39: glang po che'i rtug pa'i steng du /
T13D4312-3:269b-40: ro hi sha'i rtsa ba dang /
T13D4312-3:269b-41: se'u'i chu lde gur byas la bskus na sbrang ma'i dug thams cad 'joms pa'i mchog yin no //
T13D4312-3:269b-42: shir sha'i sa bon aarga yi //
T13D4312-3:269b-43: 'o mas lan gsum bsgos pa ni //
T13D4312-3:269b-44: pi pi ling gi phye mar bsres //
T13D4312-3:269b-45: dug sman 'dis ni srin bu'i dug / sbrul dang lu ta byi ba yi //
T13D4312-3:269b-46: dug ni sel bar byed pa yin //
T13D4312-3:269b-48: shir sha'i sa bon pi pi ling gi phye ma dang bsres la /
T13D4312-3:269b-49: aarga'i 'o mas lan gsum bsgos te sbyar ba'i sman
T13D4312-3:269b-50: 'dis ni srin bu'i dug thams cad sel bar byed
T13D4312-3:269b-51: do // shir sha ka ranydza yi sa bon dang //
T13D4312-3:270a-1: ru rta ldong ros bcas pa yi //
T13D4312-3:270a-2: dug sman 'dis ni mtshan rgyu'i sdig pas zin //
T13D4312-3:270a-3: sel bar byed pa yin par rgyal bas gsungs //
T13D4312-3:270a-5: shir sha'i sa bon la sogs pa sbyar ba'i dug
T13D4312-3:270a-6: sman 'dis ni mtshan mo rgyu ba'i sdig pas zin
T13D4312-3:270a-7: pa sel bar byed pa'i dam pa yin par rgyal
T13D4312-3:270a-8: ba ste / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so //
T13D4312-3:270a-9: srin bu las ni rab gdug pa //
T13D4312-3:270a-10: ba ni bcu drug yin par bshad //
T13D4312-3:270a-11: gzhan dag nyi shu rtsa brgyad 'dod //
T13D4312-3:270a-12: kha cig de bas mang bar 'dod //
T13D4312-3:270a-14: stong phrag yod ces gzhan dag 'chad //
T13D4312-3:270a-16: srin bu rnams las rab tu gdug cing gso dka'
T13D4312-3:270a-17: ba ni srog chags ba zhes bya ba yin la
T13D4312-3:270a-18: / de'i dbye ba yang bcu drug yod par slob dpon gyis bshad do //
T13D4312-3:270a-19: kha cig ni de nyi shu rtsa brgyad yod par 'dod do //
T13D4312-3:270a-20: drang srong gzhan dag ni de bas kyang mang bar 'dod do //
T13D4312-3:270a-21: drang srong kha cig ni nyi ma'i 'od kyi rjes
T13D4312-3:270a-22: su 'brang zhing skye ba stong phrag du ma yod
T13D4312-3:270a-23: par 'chad do // bla brnan gzugs ni mang gyur pa //
T13D4312-3:270a-24: dug can pa ni gcig pur 'dod //
T13D4312-3:270a-26: srog chags ba ni bla brnan mang zhing gzugs mang
T13D4312-3:270a-27: ba'i dug can ni gcig pu kho nar 'dod do
T13D4312-3:270a-28: // de yi gzugs dang ming dag ni //
T13D4312-3:270a-29: shin tu 'dres pas shes par dka' //
T13D4312-3:270a-30: gnas kyi nges pa yod min pas //
T13D4312-3:270a-31: de phyir nad las bshad par bya //
T13D4312-3:270a-33: ba de'i gzugs la sogs pa ni shin tu shes par dka' zhing /
T13D4312-3:270a-34: gnas kyi nges pa yang yod pa ma yin pas
T13D4312-3:270a-35: de'i rang bzhin ni nad kyi tshul las bshad par
T13D4312-3:270a-36: bya'o // nad gzhi so so'i gso ba dka' //
T13D4312-3:270a-37: 'dus pa las gyur gsor mi rung //
T13D4312-3:270a-39: ba de ni nad gzhi tha dad pa las gyur pa ni gso dka' ba yin la /
T13D4312-3:270a-40: 'dus pa las gyur pa ni gsor mi rung ba yin no //
T13D4312-3:270a-41: des zin mkhris gyur tsha ba dang //
T13D4312-3:270a-42: skom dad chu bur rims kyis 'debs //
T13D4312-3:270a-43: rmongs bag rab tsha dmar ser mdog / rnags shing rgun 'bru'i 'bras bu 'dra //
T13D4312-3:270a-45: ba des zin pa'i mkhris pa las gyur pa'i mtshan ma ni tsha ba la sogs pa yin no //
T13D4312-3:270a-46: bad kan las gyur sra zhing skye //
T13D4312-3:270b-0: gnyid che grang rims @270b lud pa lu //
T13D4312-3:270b-1: shin tu g-ya' bar byed pa yin //
T13D4312-3:270b-3: bas zin pa'i bad kan can gyi mtshan nyid ni
T13D4312-3:270b-4: sra zhing mdog skya ba la sogs pa yin no
T13D4312-3:270b-5: // rlung gyur rtsub cing gnag pa dang //
T13D4312-3:270b-6: tshigs na rims kyis 'debs par byed //
T13D4312-3:270b-8: de la rlung las gyur pa ni /
T13D4312-3:270b-9: reg na rtsub cing kha dog gnag pa la sogs pa yin no //
T13D4312-3:270b-10: de yi dbye ba nad kyi ni //
T13D4312-3:270b-11: rang gi mtshan nyid las shes bya //
T13D4312-3:270b-13: ba de'i dbye ba ni de ltar nad kyi rang gi mtshan nyid las shes par bya'o //
T13D4312-3:270b-14: gsor mi rung ba snying tsha zhing //
T13D4312-3:270b-15: lud pa skyigs bu mgo nad dang //
T13D4312-3:270b-16: 'brum phran dkar dang ser dang gnag / dmar dang skya ba las 'byung 'gyur //
T13D4312-3:270b-17: 'dar zhing skrangs la tsha ba dang //
T13D4312-3:270b-18: skom dad lang zhing sna 'chus la //
T13D4312-3:270b-19: mchu gnag so ni g-yo ba dang //
T13D4312-3:270b-20: rgyab dang mid pa bcom snyam sems //
T13D4312-3:270b-22: khrag ni mchus bldags rma las 'dzag / ces bya ba la /
T13D4312-3:270b-23: bas bldags pa gso bar mi rung ba ni /
T13D4312-3:270b-24: snying tsha ba la sogs pa dang /
T13D4312-3:270b-25: 'brum phran mdog dkar ba la sogs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13D4312-3:270b-26: 'dar ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can nas mchus
T13D4312-3:270b-27: bldags pa las 'dzam bu smin pa'i 'bras bu 'dra
T13D4312-3:270b-28: ba'i khrag 'dzag par 'gyur ba'i bar yin no //
T13D4312-3:270b-29: 'dus gyur mtshan nyid kun ldan zhing //
T13D4312-3:270b-30: ming ni mang por gyur pa yin //
T13D4312-3:270b-32: ba thams cad kyang 'dus pa las gyur pa yin zhing /
T13D4312-3:270b-33: nad skyed par byed pa yin la /
T13D4312-3:270b-34: de'i ming yang du mar gyur pa yin no //
T13D4312-3:270b-35: de'i dug rnon po bar ma dang //
T13D4312-3:270b-36: dman pa'i dbye bas gsum du 'gyur //
T13D4312-3:270b-38: ba de ni dug rnon po la sogs pa'i dbye bas rnam pa gsum du 'gyur ro //
T13D4312-3:270b-39: ma bcos zhag bdun zhag bcu dang //
T13D4312-3:270b-40: zla ba phyed kyi rims kyis gsod //
T13D4312-3:270b-42: ba de'i dug ni ma bcos shing gso ba ma
T13D4312-3:270b-43: byas na dug rnon pos ni zhag bdun nas gsod
T13D4312-3:270b-44: do // dug bar mas ni zhag bcu nas gsod do //
T13D4312-3:270b-45: dug dman pas ni zla ba phyed kyis gsod do //
T13D4312-3:270b-46: ba dang mchu rings thams cad kyang //
T13D4312-3:270b-47: glang shu kor kor por byed cing //
T13D4312-3:270b-48: dkar dang gnag dang dmar dang ser //
T13D4312-3:271a-2: / dbus su gnag pa 'am sngo ba la //
T13D4312-3:271a-3: mtha' ma dra ba lta bus khebs //
T13D4312-3:271a-4: mched cing skrang bar byed pa dang //
T13D4312-3:271a-5: tsha zhing mang du na ba dang //
T13D4312-3:271a-7: rul zhing gas par byed pa dang //
T13D4312-3:271a-8: rnag gis gang du reg gyur pa'i //
T13D4312-3:271a-9: phyogs der yang ni rma skyed byed //
T13D4312-3:271a-11: ba dang sbrang bu mchu ring la sogs pa thams
T13D4312-3:271a-12: cad kyang glang shu zlum po kor kor po dang
T13D4312-3:271a-14: mdog ni dkar po la sogs pa gang yang rung bar gyur la /
T13D4312-3:271a-15: de bzhin du 'jam pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa dang /
T13D4312-3:271a-16: shu ba mched pa la sogs pa dang /
T13D4312-3:271a-17: rims la sogs pa skyed par byed pa yin no //
T13D4312-3:271a-18: dbugs dang mche ba bshang gci dang //
T13D4312-3:271a-19: khu chu kha chu sen mo khrag / brgyad po gnod byed khyad par du //
T13D4312-3:271a-20: dug ni kha la gnas pa yin //
T13D4312-3:271a-22: ba la sogs pa'i srin bu gdug pa 'di dag ni /
T13D4312-3:271a-23: dbugs la sogs pa brgyad la dug yod pas gnod par byed la /
T13D4312-3:271a-24: khyad par du ni dug de kha la gnas pa yin no //
T13D4312-3:271a-25: ba ni lte ba yan chad 'dzin //
T13D4312-3:271a-26: srin bu stod smad kun tu gnod //
T13D4312-3:271a-28: ba ni lte ba yan chad du gnod cing dug 'debs par byed la ;
T13D4312-3:271a-29: srin bu ni lus kyi stod smad kun tu gnod par byed do //
T13D4312-3:271a-30: des gnod byas pa'i gos la sogs //
T13D4312-3:271a-31: lus la reg na nad skyed byed //
T13D4312-3:271a-33: ba dang srin bu gdug pa des gnod cing gos
T13D4312-3:271a-34: par byas pa'i gos la sogs pas lus la reg
T13D4312-3:271a-35: na yang dug gi nad skyed par byed do ;
T13D4312-3:271a-36: / ba dang srin bu las gyur dug / nyin phyed bar du tshor mi 'gyur //
T13D4312-3:271a-38: ba dang sbrang bu gdug pa la sogs pas zin
T13D4312-3:271a-39: pa'i dug ni nyi ma phyed kyi bar du tshor
T13D4312-3:271a-41: de nas dang po'i nyin zhag la //
T13D4312-3:271a-42: khab kyis gtsags pa snyam du sems //
T13D4312-3:271a-43: mdog mi gsal zhing gso ba dang //
T13D4312-3:271a-44: cung zad g-ya' zhing nad dang ldan //
T13D4312-3:271a-46: de'i 'og tu srin bus zin pa de dang po'i
T13D4312-3:271a-47: nyin zhag la khab kyis gtsags pa snyam du sems
T13D4312-3:271a-49: gnyis par mtha' ma shin tu mtho //
T13D4312-3:271b-0: mdog @271b gsal gyur nas dbus dma' zhing //
T13D4312-3:271b-1: g-ya' zhing rmen bu lta bur snang //
T13D4312-3:271b-3: sbrang bu gdug pas zin nas zhag gnyis pa'i mtha'
T13D4312-3:271b-4: ma ni shin tu mtho ba la sogs par 'gyur
T13D4312-3:271b-5: ro // gsum par rims bcas spu ldang zhing //
T13D4312-3:271b-6: 'khor ling dmar por snang ba dang //
T13D4312-3:271b-7: kham phor gzugs 'dra phal cher ni //
T13D4312-3:271b-10: zhag gsum par ni rims dang bcas pa la sogs par 'gyur zhing /
T13D4312-3:271b-11: ba sbu'i bu ga nas chu ser la sogs pa 'dzag par 'gyur ro //
T13D4312-3:271b-12: nyin zhag bzhi par rab skrang zhing //
T13D4312-3:271b-13: mgo 'khor lus tsha dbugs mi bde //
T13D4312-3:271b-15: de'i nyin zhag bzhi pa la ni de las gyur pa'i nad skrang ba la sogs par 'gyur ro //
T13D4312-3:271b-16: lnga par dug ldang las gyur pa'i //
T13D4312-3:271b-17: nad ni de dang de dag skyed //
T13D4312-3:271b-18: drug par gnang du khyab par byed //
T13D4312-3:271b-19: bdun par srog ni 'joms par byed //
T13D4312-3:271b-21: gdug pa'i dug des drug pa la ni gnad rnams la khyab par byed la /
T13D4312-3:271b-22: zhag bdun pa la ni gsod par byed do //
T13D4312-3:271b-23: de ltar dug ni rnon po dang //
T13D4312-3:271b-24: bar ma dman pa dbye bar bya //
T13D4312-3:271b-26: tshul de ltar na rnon po la sogs pa'i dug gi dbye ba bstan pa yin no //
T13D4312-3:271b-27: de nas nyin zhag nyi shu ni //
T13D4312-3:271b-28: gcig na yong ye zhi bar 'gyur //
T13D4312-3:271b-30: de nas nyin zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig 'das nas
T13D4312-3:271b-31: ni rnam pa thams cad du zhi bar 'gyur ro
T13D4312-3:271b-32: // de nas ba yis zin pa ni //
T13D4312-3:271b-33: mtshon gyis rma ni gnod par bya //
T13D4312-3:271b-34: 'dzam bu'i mchu la sogs pas bsreg / mkhris pa las gyur bsreg mi bya //
T13D4312-3:271b-36: de'i 'og tu bas bldags pa'i rma mtshon gyis bcad de gnod pa dang /
T13D4312-3:271b-37: 'dzam bu'i mchu la sogs pa'i cha spyad kyis bsreg par bya'o //
T13D4312-3:271b-38: mkhris pa las gyur pa'i rma ni bsreg tu mi rung ste /
T13D4312-3:271b-39: mes ni mkhris pa las gyur pa'i rma'i nad skye ba'i phyir ro //
T13D4312-3:271b-40: rtsub cing spu ni gyes pa dang //
T13D4312-3:271b-41: gnad dang tshigs la sogs pa nas //
T13D4312-3:271b-42: zin nas kun tu khyab gyur pa //
T13D4312-3:271b-43: gcad par mi bya bsreg mi bya //
T13D4312-3:271b-45: rtsub pa la sogs pa'i mtshon gyis gcad du yang
T13D4312-3:271b-46: mi rung la mes bsreg tu yang mi rung ngo
T13D4312-3:271b-47: // bsreg pa dug sman rgyam tsha dang //
T13D4312-3:271b-48: sbrang rtsir sbyar bas bsku bar bya //
T13D4312-3:272a-2: mche bas zin pa bsreg pa la ni rgyam tsha
T13D4312-3:272a-3: dang sbrang rtsir sbyar ba'i dug sman bsku bar bya'o
T13D4312-3:272a-4: // de rjes 'o ma can shing bskol //
T13D4312-3:272a-5: sman khu shin tu bsil mo blugs //
T13D4312-3:272a-7: 'bus zin pa'i rma bsregs pa de'i 'og tu sman gyi khu ba yang blugs par bya'o //
T13D4312-3:272a-8: rngabs rva sogs sam gtar ga yis //
T13D4312-3:272a-9: thams cad la ni khrag dbyung bya //
T13D4312-3:272a-11: gdug ba'i srin bus zin pa thams cad la rngabs rva la sogs pas khrag dbyung bar bya'o //
T13D4312-3:272a-12: de nas bsil sman bsku blugs bya //
T13D4312-3:272a-14: de nas de'i 'og tu bsil ba'i sman gyi lnga gus bsku ba dang ;
T13D4312-3:272a-15: shin tu bsil ba'i sman gyi chu blugs par bya'o //
T13D4312-3:272a-16: sle sman ta ka aa shvad tha //
T13D4312-3:272a-17: ba ru ra dang pri yang ku //
T13D4312-3:272a-18: shug pa ser gnyis sbrang rtsir sbyar //
T13D4312-3:272a-19: ba dang srin bu la sogs pa'i //
T13D4312-3:272a-20: dug 'joms las ni thams cad byed //
T13D4312-3:272a-22: sle sman ta ka la sogs pa sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba'i lde gus bas bldags pa dang /
T13D4312-3:272a-23: srin bu gdug pas zin pa la sogs pa'i dug sel zhing las thams cad byed pa yin no //
T13D4312-3:272a-24: ser po rnam gnyis rma shing btsod //
T13D4312-3:272a-25: padma ge ser rgya spos ni //
T13D4312-3:272a-26: sbrang rtsi mar sbyar tsam pa ka / snga ma
T13D4312-3:272a-27: bas kyang yon tan lhag / ces bya ba la
T13D4312-3:272a-28: / ser po rnam gnyis la sogs pa sbyar ba'i dug sman ni tsam pa ka zhes bya ste /
T13D4312-3:272a-29: snga ma bas yon tan che ba yin no //
T13D4312-3:272a-30: lci khu btsir dang ka ra dkar //
T13D4312-3:272a-31: aa pa marga ldong ros dang //
T13D4312-3:272a-32: ba bla skyer pa bya ma ka / yug snam sbrang rtsi mar de bzhin //
T13D4312-3:272a-34: lci khu btsir ba la sogs pa'i sman ni de bzhin te /
T13D4312-3:272a-35: ba la sogs pa'i dug 'joms shing las thams cad byed pa yin no //
T13D4312-3:272a-36: rgya spos na le sham sug smel //
T13D4312-3:272a-37: ru rta shing mngar sbrang rtsi mar //
T13D4312-3:272a-38: sbyar ba'i sman ni man da ra //
T13D4312-3:272a-40: rgya sbos la sogs pa sbyar ba'i sman ni ming man da ra zhes bya ste /
