T13D4312-3:284a-36: du ba ra de'i 'bras bu shin tu legs par
T13D4312-3:284a-37: smin pa dbyar gyi tshe btu zhing blang bar bya'o
T13D4312-3:284a-38: // 'bras bu de las rkang phyung nas //
T13D4312-3:284a-39: bskams te phye mar btags nas ni ;
T13D4312-3:284a-40: / til bzhin btsir bar bya ba'am //
T13D4312-3:284a-41: le brgan me tog bzhin du bskol //
T13D4312-3:284a-43: shing de'i 'bras bu las rkang phyung ste bskams la
T13D4312-3:284a-44: btags nas gtun la til bzhin du btsir bar bya
T13D4312-3:284a-45: ba 'am le brgan rtsi bzhin du bskol la /
T13D4312-3:284a-47: de yi mar bsags gyur pa ni ;
T13D4312-3:284a-48: / chung zad pa yi bar du bskol //
T13D4312-3:284a-49: phab ste ba yi lci ba yi //
T13D4312-3:284a-50: nang du zla phyed tsam du gzhug / ces bya ba la /
T13D4312-3:284a-51: de'i mar bsags par bya ba ni chung ngu'i bar du bskol bar bya'o //
T13D4312-3:284a-52: de'i 'og tu phab la ba'i lci ba'i nang du zla ba phyed kyi bar du gzhag par bya'o //
T13D4312-3:284a-53: de 'og de las phyung nas ni //
T13D4312-3:284b-0: @284b snum zhing dugs byas dri ma bsal //
T13D4312-3:284b-1: zas kyi dus ni bzhi chod par //
T13D4312-3:284b-2: nang par zho gnyis tsam zhig btung //
T13D4312-3:284b-3: mar de nyi ma shis pa la //
T13D4312-3:284b-4: sngags 'di yis ni dag par bya //
T13D4312-3:284b-5: rkang pa gnyis po brtson pa che //
T13D4312-3:284b-6: lus zungs thams cad skyong byed par //
T13D4312-3:284b-7: 'khor lo dbyig pa dung thogs la //
T13D4312-3:284b-8: mi 'pho bas ni khyod la bsgo //
T13D4312-3:284b-9: de gang 'di yi nad steng dang //
T13D4312-3:284b-10: 'og gi nad ni du ma sel //
T13D4312-3:284b-11: dgongs ka snum dang lan tshvar bcas //
T13D4312-3:284b-12: nas thug grang mo btung bar bya //
T13D4312-3:284b-14: de la de'i 'og tu phyung la dang por snum
T13D4312-3:284b-15: dang dugs byas la dri ma'i tshogs bsal te zas
T13D4312-3:284b-16: kyi dus bzhi bzhis chod pa'i dus su nang par
T13D4312-3:284b-17: gyi dus su zho gnyis gnyis kyi tshad tsam btung
T13D4312-3:284b-18: la / btung ba de yang nyin zhag shis pa la /
T13D4312-3:284b-19: rkang pa gnyis po brtson pa che //
T13D4312-3:284b-20: zhes bya ba'i sngags kyi tshigs bcad bzlas la btung bar bya'o //
T13D4312-3:284b-21: mar de sbyar bas skyes bu de'i nad steng dang 'og tu gtogs pa sel bar byed do //
T13D4312-3:284b-22: de ltar sman 'thungs nas dgongs ka'i snum dang lan
T13D4312-3:284b-23: tshvar bcas pa'i nas thug grang mo btung bar bya'o
T13D4312-3:284b-24: // mar de zhag lnga'i bar du btung //
T13D4312-3:284b-25: spang bar bya ba thams cad spang //
T13D4312-3:284b-26: zla phyed mud ga'i khu ba btung //
T13D4312-3:284b-27: mdze nad kun las thar bar 'gyur //
T13D4312-3:284b-29: tshul de ltar mar de zhag lnga'i bar du btung
T13D4312-3:284b-30: bar bya zhing zas skom dang spyod lam la sogs
T13D4312-3:284b-31: pa spang bar bya ba gang yin pa spang bar
T13D4312-3:284b-32: bya ba dang / zla ba phyed kyi bar du
T13D4312-3:284b-33: mon sran sde'u'i khu ba 'thungs na mdze'i nad thams
T13D4312-3:284b-35: de nyid seng ldeng khu ba ni //
T13D4312-3:284b-36: sum 'gyur dang ni legs par bskol //
T13D4312-3:284b-37: snga ma bzhin du zla phyed bzhag / legs par bsdams te zla gcig btung //
T13D4312-3:284b-38: de yis lus ni bsku ba dang //
T13D4312-3:284b-39: ji skad bshad pa'i zas zos pa'i //
T13D4312-3:284b-40: sbyor ba 'di yis myur du ni //
T13D4312-3:284b-41: mdze can mi ni gso bar bya //
T13D4312-3:284b-43: mar de nyid seng ldeng gi khu ba sum 'gyur
T13D4312-3:284b-44: dang legs par bskol ba ji skad smos pa bzhin
T13D4312-3:284b-45: du bzhag ste / zla ba gcig gi bar du
T13D4312-3:284b-46: 'thungs na yang ji skad smos pa'i yon tan thob
T13D4312-3:284b-47: du bzhag ste / par 'gyur zhing / khyad par
T13D4312-3:284b-48: du sbyor ba 'dis mdzes btab pa'i nad pa gso
T13D4312-3:284b-49: du bzhag ste / par 'gyur zhing / bar bya'o // de nyid seng ldeng med par ni //
T13D4312-3:284b-50: zhun mar sbrang rtsi ldan par btung //
T13D4312-3:284b-51: zla phyed bar du sha khu btung //
T13D4312-3:285a-2: du ba ra'i mar de nyid seng ldeng gi khu
T13D4312-3:285a-3: ba med par zhun mar dang bskol te sbrang rtsi
T13D4312-3:285a-4: btab pas zla ba phyed kyi bar du bsten zhing
T13D4312-3:285a-5: sha khu 'thungs na de lo nyis brgya 'tsho bar
T13D4312-3:285a-6: 'gyur ro // de nyid zhag ni lnga bcu'i bar //
T13D4312-3:285a-7: sna sman du ni btang gyur na ;
T13D4312-3:285a-8: / lus rgyas thos pa 'dzin pa dang //
T13D4312-3:285a-11: sman mar de nyid zhag lnga bcu'i bar du sna
T13D4312-3:285a-12: sman btang na lus rgyas pa la sogs par 'gyur
T13D4312-3:285a-13: ro // pi pi ling ni pa la sha'i //
T13D4312-3:285a-14: thal chur spangs shing mar dang brngos //
T13D4312-3:285a-15: rdog ma gsum gsum snga dro dang //
T13D4312-3:285a-16: zas kyi sngon du bza' bar bya //
T13D4312-3:285a-17: bcud len yon tan 'dod pa yis //
T13D4312-3:285a-18: sbrang rtsi dang ni sbyar te bza' //
T13D4312-3:285a-20: pi pi ling gi rdog ma lnga 'am brgyad dam
T13D4312-3:285a-21: bdun nam bcu mar dang sbrang rtsir sbyar ba bcud
T13D4312-3:285a-22: kyis len 'dod pas cho ga bzhin du lo gcig
T13D4312-3:285a-23: gi bar du spyad par bya'o //
T13D4312-3:285a-24: pi pi ling de nyid pa la sha zhes bya
T13D4312-3:285a-25: ba rgya skyegs shing king shu ka'i thal ba btsags
T13D4312-3:285a-26: pa'i chur spangs la mar dang brngos pa rdog ma
T13D4312-3:285a-28: gsum ni zas zos pa'i sngon du sbrang rtsi dang bcas par bza' bar bya ste /
T13D4312-3:285a-29: de ni bcud kyis len gyi yon tan du 'gyur ro //
T13D4312-3:285a-30: pi pi ling bcu nyin re bzhin //
T13D4312-3:285a-31: rim gyis bskyed par gyur pa dag //
T13D4312-3:285a-32: de bzhin 'o mar sbyar te bza' //
T13D4312-3:285a-33: de bzhin du ni dbri bar bya //
T13D4312-3:285a-34: sman zhu nas ni drug cu pa'i //
T13D4312-3:285a-36: pi pi ling ni stong ni bar //
T13D4312-3:285a-38: stobs dang ldan la de btags sbyin //
T13D4312-3:285a-39: stobs dbri ba la bskol te blud //
T13D4312-3:285a-41: nyin re zhing pi pi ling bcu bcus rim gyis
T13D4312-3:285a-42: bskyed de zhag bcu'i bar du 'o ma dang lhan
T13D4312-3:285a-44: de bzhin du zhag bcu'i bar du bcu bcus dbri zhing 'o ma dang bcas par bsten par bya'o //
T13D4312-3:285a-46: de nas zhag dang po la ni pi pi ling bcu 'o ma dang sbyar te gtang bar bya'o //
T13D4312-3:285a-47: de bzhin du gnyis pa la ni nyi shu /
T13D4312-3:285a-48: gsum pa la ni sum cu /
T13D4312-3:285a-49: de nas zhag bcu pa la brgya'i bar du bskyed cing 'o ma dang bcas par bza' la /
T13D4312-3:285a-50: de nas ni rim bzhin du dbri bar bya ste /
T13D4312-3:285a-51: de nas zhag bcu gcig pa la dgu bcu /
T13D4312-3:285b-0: zhag bcu gnyis @285b pa la brgyad cu nas zhag bcu dgu pa la bcu'i bar bza' ste /
T13D4312-3:285b-1: de ltar na stong tshang bar 'gyur ro //
T13D4312-3:285b-2: sbyor ba 'di la sman zhu nas 'o ma dang
T13D4312-3:285b-3: zhun mar dang drug cu pa'i 'bras chan dang bcas
T13D4312-3:285b-4: par bza' ste / 'di ni pi pi ling stong gi bcud len zhes bya'o //
T13D4312-3:285b-5: pi pi ling de mi nyams stobs chen po dang
T13D4312-3:285b-6: ldan pa la ni btags pa'i phye ma sbyin par
T13D4312-3:285b-7: bya la / stobs bar ma dag la ni bskol te blud par bya'o //
T13D4312-3:285b-8: de bzhin ra yi 'o ma dang //
T13D4312-3:285b-9: nyis stong gi ni bar du gtang //
T13D4312-3:285b-11: de bzhin du ra'i 'o ma dang pi pi ling
T13D4312-3:285b-12: du bcas par bskyed dbri snga ma bzhin du byas
T13D4312-3:285b-13: te nyis stong gi bar du yang gtang bar bya'o
T13D4312-3:285b-14: // pi pi ling gi sbyor ba 'dis //
T13D4312-3:285b-15: lud pa dbugs mi bde mgul nad //
T13D4312-3:285b-16: gcong chen gzhang 'brum pho ba'i nad //
T13D4312-3:285b-17: gcin snyi skya rbab mi bzad rims //
T13D4312-3:285b-18: 'or nad slon dang skyigs bu dang //
T13D4312-3:285b-19: mdzer pa dreg nad 'joms par byed //
T13D4312-3:285b-21: bshad ma thag pa'i pi pi ling gi sbyor ba
T13D4312-3:285b-22: 'dis ni lud pa dreg nad kyi bar du 'joms
T13D4312-3:285b-23: par byed do // pi pi ling ni srang phyed lde gur byas //
T13D4312-3:285b-24: lcags kyi snod bskus nas ni nub gcig bzhag / de dang chu ni snyim gang nang par btung //
T13D4312-3:285b-25: lo gcig bza' btung spyod pa ci 'dod bsten //
T13D4312-3:285b-27: pi pi ling srang phyed lde gur byas pas lcags
T13D4312-3:285b-28: kyi snod bskus te mtshan mo bzhag la de nang
T13D4312-3:285b-29: par chu snyim pa gang dang bcas par 'thungs nas
T13D4312-3:285b-30: / lo gcig gi bar du bsten zhing bza' btung ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du spyad par bya'o //
T13D4312-3:285b-31: bca' sga sle tres shing mngar byi dang ga / ba la aa ti ba la 'bras bu gsum //
T13D4312-3:285b-32: gla sgang thang shing yung ba aa ga ru //
T13D4312-3:285b-33: mu zi padma autpal kru trug tres //
T13D4312-3:285b-34: da ta aa shva karna aa sa na //
T13D4312-3:285b-35: ba la'i lo ma'am snying po de bzhin du //
T13D4312-3:285b-36: pi pi ling bzhin lcags snod bsku sogs bya //
T13D4312-3:285b-37: lo brgya 'tsho zhing rgas dang nad las thar //
T13D4312-3:285b-38: 'o ma snyim gang gi ni bcud len sman //
T13D4312-3:285b-39: sbyar ba 'di yis lcags snod bskus pas ni //
T13D4312-3:285b-40: sngar bshad yon tan pas kyang lhag bskyed cing //
T13D4312-3:285b-41: tshe yang de las nyis 'gyur skyed par byed //
T13D4312-3:285b-43: bca' sga la sogs pa pi pi ling gi cho
T13D4312-3:285b-44: ga bzhin du bsten par byas pas kyang lo brgyar
T13D4312-3:286a-1: la pi pi ling bskus pa'i sbyor bas yon tan
T13D4312-3:286a-2: che zhing tshe yang de'i nyis 'gyur gyis 'phel bar
T13D4312-3:286a-3: byed do // aa sa na dang seng ldeng gi / khu bar so ma ra dza spangs //
T13D4312-3:286a-4: sbrang rtsi ru rta mar dang ni //
T13D4312-3:286a-5: aa ru ra dang lcags phyer bcas //
T13D4312-3:286a-6: lde gu lo gcig bar zos na //
T13D4312-3:286a-7: rgas dang mi 'phrod zos pa las //
T13D4312-3:286a-8: nad ni yongs su 'dor bar byed //
T13D4312-3:286a-10: aa sa na dang seng ldeng bskol ba'i khu bar
T13D4312-3:286a-11: so ma ra dza sbangs pa sbrang rtsi dang bcas
T13D4312-3:286a-12: pa'i lde gu mi sa lo gcig gi bar du
T13D4312-3:286a-13: bsten na rgas pa dang kha zas mi 'phrod pa
T13D4312-3:286a-14: zos pa las nad du gyur pa yongs su 'dor
T13D4312-3:286a-15: bar byed do // mdze nad mi bzad pa yis ni //
T13D4312-3:286a-16: lus nyen gyur pa gang yin pas //
T13D4312-3:286a-17: so ma ra dza til nag gnyis //
T13D4312-3:286a-18: lo gcig bar du bsten na ni //
T13D4312-3:286a-19: de ni zla rgyas lta bur 'gyur //
T13D4312-3:286a-21: mdze nad mi bzad pas thebs par gyur pa gang
T13D4312-3:286a-22: yin pa des so ma ra dza dang til nag
T13D4312-3:286a-23: po gnyis lo gcig gi bar du bsten na de'i
T13D4312-3:286a-24: lus zla ba lta bur 'gyur ro //
T13D4312-3:286a-25: gang zhig so ma ra dza sbun pa med //
T13D4312-3:286a-26: btags pa 'o ma lhan cig zhor mnan pa'i //
T13D4312-3:286a-27: snying po phyung la sbrang rtsi'i lde gu bldags //
T13D4312-3:286a-28: de rjes de nyid kyi ni dar ba btung //
T13D4312-3:286a-29: mdze yi nad kyis yan lag nyams pa dang //
T13D4312-3:286a-30: sna chad sor mo 'brul ba la sogs pa //
T13D4312-3:286a-31: shing bcad rjes la ljon shing skye ba ltar //
T13D4312-3:286a-32: de ni nges par skye bar 'gyur ba yin //
T13D4312-3:286a-34: mi gang zhig so mar dza sbun ba med pa
T13D4312-3:286a-35: la sogs pa'i sbyor bas de'i snying bo mar sar
T13D4312-3:286a-36: phyung la sbrang rtsi dang sbyar ba bldags par gyur
T13D4312-3:286a-37: nas / de'i rjes la dar ba de nyid 'thungs
T13D4312-3:286a-38: na mdze nad kyis sna chad cing sor mo 'brul
T13D4312-3:286a-39: ba la sogs pa'i gnod pa dang ldan par gyur
T13D4312-3:286a-40: pa yang sna dang sen mo la sogs pa mdzes
T13D4312-3:286a-41: nas / par skye ste / dper na shing bcad
T13D4312-3:286a-42: pa las ljon shing skyes pa dang 'dra bar 'gyur
T13D4312-3:286a-43: nas / par skye ste / ro // sgra gcan bdud rtsi brkus pa na //
T13D4312-3:286a-44: ske bcad pa las 'dzag gyur pa'i //
T13D4312-3:286a-45: bdud rtsi'i thigs pa sar ltung ba //
T13D4312-3:286a-46: sgog skya nyid du gyur pa yin //
T13D4312-3:286a-47: lha min lus las byung bas na //
T13D4312-3:286a-48: de phyir bram zes de mi bza' //
T13D4312-3:286a-50: sgra gcan 'dzin gyis bdud rtsi brkus bar gyur nas
T13D4312-3:286a-51: khyab 'jug gis ske bcad par gyur pa na bdud
T13D4312-3:286b-0: rtsi'i @286b thigs pa des la lhung ba na sgog
T13D4312-3:286b-1: skya nyid du gyur pa yin la /
T13D4312-3:286b-2: de bas na sgog skya de ni lha ma yin
T13D4312-3:286b-3: gyi lus las byung ba yin pa'i phyir bram ze
T13D4312-3:286b-4: dag mi za'o // mngon du bdud rtsi las byung bas //
T13D4312-3:286b-5: de ni bcud kyis len mchog yin //
T13D4312-3:286b-7: sgog skya de ni bdud rtsi las mngon sum du
T13D4312-3:286b-8: byung ba yin pa'i phyir bcud kyis len thams cad
T13D4312-3:286b-10: grang ba'i dus na'ang sgog skya bsten //
T13D4312-3:286b-11: dpyid dus bad kan shas cher bza' //
T13D4312-3:286b-12: sos ka'i dus su'ang spyad bya zhing //
T13D4312-3:286b-13: dbyar ni rlung gis gzir tshe bza' //
T13D4312-3:286b-14: dgun ni snum zhing bsil ba dang //
T13D4312-3:286b-15: mngar bas nye bar bsres pa dang //
T13D4312-3:286b-16: de ni phreng ba rgyan dag dang //
T13D4312-3:286b-17: 'khor dang lhan cig bsten par bya //
T13D4312-3:286b-19: mi lus snum zhing bsil ba dang mngar bar bsres la grang ba'i dus dgun stod dang /
T13D4312-3:286b-20: dgun sman na ni sgog skya bsten par bya la /
T13D4312-3:286b-21: de bzhin du dpyid kyi tshe la sogs pa'i tshe
T13D4312-3:286b-22: na yang phreng ba la sogs pa'i longs spyod thams
T13D4312-3:286b-24: de yi lde gu dpyid kyi tshe //
T13D4312-3:286b-25: kha ba can gyi yul skyes pa //
T13D4312-3:286b-26: shun pa bshus nas mtshan mo ni //
T13D4312-3:286b-27: chang sogs la ni sbang bar bya //
T13D4312-3:286b-28: de yi khu ba nang par ni //
T13D4312-3:286b-29: ras ni gtsang mas btsags nas kyang //
T13D4312-3:286b-30: chang ni legs par langs gyur pa //
T13D4312-3:286b-31: cha gsum dang ni sbyar ba 'am //
T13D4312-3:286b-32: chang gzhan dag gam til mar ram //
T13D4312-3:286b-33: rang skyur ram ni zho ga chu //
T13D4312-3:286b-34: de tshe nyid sbyar nang par ni //
T13D4312-3:286b-35: tshad dang ldan par sbyin bya zhing //
T13D4312-3:286b-36: 'o ma zhun mar zhag dang rkang //
T13D4312-3:286b-37: skam sa'i sha khu so sor ni //
T13D4312-3:286b-38: bskol ba nad gzhi ji bzhin blud //
T13D4312-3:286b-39: yang na sman khu 'ba' zhig blud //
T13D4312-3:286b-40: dang por mkhur gang tsam 'thungs na //
T13D4312-3:286b-41: mid pa'i sbubs ni dag par byed //
T13D4312-3:286b-43: sgog skya de'i lde gu dpyid kyi tshe ni ji
T13D4312-3:286b-44: skad smos pa bzhin du btsags pa'i khu ba chang
T13D4312-3:286b-45: cha gsum mam / chang gzhan nam /
T13D4312-3:286b-46: til mar la sogs pa gang yang rung ba'i cha gsum dang btung ba de nyi tshe sbyar la /
T13D4312-3:286b-47: tshad dang ldan par byas te /
T13D4312-3:286b-48: 'o ma la sogs pa gang yang rung ba dang /
T13D4312-3:286b-49: nad gzhi ji lta ba la blud par bya ba'am /
T13D4312-3:286b-50: yang sgog skya'i khu ba 'ba' zhig blud pa la
T13D4312-3:286b-51: sogs pas kyang mid pa'i sbubs dag bar byed do
T13D4312-3:287a-2: na zhing zug pa dag la phan //
T13D4312-3:287a-4: sgog skya rang gi khu ba rgyun du blugs pa'i
T13D4312-3:287a-5: dugs byas na na zhing zug pa la sogs pa'i
T13D4312-3:287a-7: skyug cing brgyal ba'i nad la ni //
T13D4312-3:287a-8: 'phral du chu grang dag kyang blud //
T13D4312-3:287a-10: skyug pa la sogs pa la ni 'phral du chu grang la sogs pa blud par bya'o //
T13D4312-3:287a-11: ngal ba med cing lus kyi ni //
T13D4312-3:287a-12: gzi mdangs brtan pas lhag ma sbyin //
T13D4312-3:287a-14: ngal ba la sogs pa la ni sgog skya btsir ba'i lhag ma sbyin par bya'o //
T13D4312-3:287a-15: tsha ba bsal bar bya ba'i phyir //
T13D4312-3:287a-16: shin tu bsil bas bsku bya zhing //
T13D4312-3:287a-17: mu tig ga bur phreng ba can //
T13D4312-3:287a-18: chu thigs phre'u bsten par bya //
T13D4312-3:287a-20: lus tsha ba bsal ba'i phyir ni sgog skya'i khu
T13D4312-3:287a-21: ba bsil sman la sogs pa'i chu dang bcas pa
T13D4312-3:287a-22: blud par bya'o // 'di yi tshad chen phul gang ste //
T13D4312-3:287a-23: nyi tshe la ni de yi phyed //
T13D4312-3:287a-25: sgog skya 'di'i khu ba'i tshad chen po ni phul gang ste /

T13D4312-3:287a-33: zhu nas s'a lu rnying pa'i chan //
T13D4312-3:287a-34: dung dang kun da ltar dkar ba //
T13D4312-3:287a-35: yu sha 'o ma skam sa yi //

T13D4312-3:287a-42: rgun 'bru'i chu ni blud par bya //
T13D4312-3:287a-44: gal te gnas skabs der skom par gyur na /

T13D4312-3:287b-0: sgog skya shun pa bshus @287b pa'i snying po ni //
T13D4312-3:287b-1: sreg sha dag gam bza' ba sna tshogs sam //
T13D4312-3:287b-2: sha gtubs pa'am mar dang tshar bcas bza' //
T13D4312-3:287b-3: kha zas nyung ba ci 'dod spyad par bya //
T13D4312-3:287b-5: yang sgog skya shun pa bshus pa de sreg sha
T13D4312-3:287b-6: la sogs pa gang yang rung ba dang lhan cig

T13D4312-3:287b-8: khrag dang mkhris pa'i nad ni ma gtogs pa //
T13D4312-3:287b-9: nad gzhi ma lus ldan par 'gyur ba 'am //
T13D4312-3:287b-10: rlung nad nyi tshe dang ni ldan gyur la //
T13D4312-3:287b-11: sgog pa las lhag sman gzhan yod ma yin //
T13D4312-3:287b-13: khrag dang mkhris pa med pa'i rlung nad dam //
T13D4312-3:287b-14: yang na rlung nad 'ba' zhig la ni sman gyi mchog sgog skya 'ba' zhig yin no //
T13D4312-3:287b-15: chu dang bu ram 'o ma sred //
T13D4312-3:287b-16: sha chang skyur la mi dga' zhing //
T13D4312-3:287b-17: ma zhu ba ni spong mi nus //
T13D4312-3:287b-18: sgog skya nges par gnod pa skyed //
T13D4312-3:287b-20: mi chu dang bu ram la sred par gyur cing
T13D4312-3:287b-21: sha dang chang dang skyur la ni sred pa med
T13D4312-3:287b-22: par gyur pa dag ma zhu ba'i nad sel zhing
T13D4312-3:287b-23: spong bar mi nus pa dag la ni sgog skya
T13D4312-3:287b-24: nges par gnod pa skyed par 'gyur ro //
T13D4312-3:287b-25: mkhris pa ldang ba'i 'jigs pa yi //
T13D4312-3:287b-26: tha mar bkru sman 'jam po gtang //
T13D4312-3:287b-27: de ltar bcud len yon tan ni //
T13D4312-3:287b-28: yongs su rdzogs pa thob par 'gyur //
T13D4312-3:287b-30: sgog skya bsten pa dag gis mkhris pa'i nad ldang bar dogs na /
T13D4312-3:287b-31: sman btang ba'i tha mar bkru sman gtang bar bya ste /
T13D4312-3:287b-32: des ni bcud kyis len gyi yon tan rdzogs pa kho nar 'gyur ro //
T13D4312-3:287b-33: so ga'i tsha bas gdungs drags las //
T13D4312-3:287b-34: rgya skyegs khu ba ltar 'dzag gang //
T13D4312-3:287b-35: gser sogs 'byung khungs drug gi bcud //
T13D4312-3:287b-36: de ni brag zhun zhes byar bshad //

T13D4312-3:287b-39: pa las gser la sogs pa 'byung khungs kyi khams
T13D4312-3:287b-40: drug gi bcud rgya skyegs kyi khu ba zhu ba
T13D4312-3:287b-41: ltar 'dzag par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni
T13D4312-3:287b-43: de ni kun kyang kha zhing tsha //
T13D4312-3:287b-44: shas cher me drod zhu rjes tsha //
T13D4312-3:287b-45: gcod par byed de de la ni //
T13D4312-3:287b-46: lcags las byung ba rab tu bsngags //
T13D4312-3:287b-48: brag zhun de thams cad kyang ro ni kha la
T13D4312-3:287b-49: nus pa ni shin tu dro ba ma yin la
T13D4312-3:287b-50: zhu rjes ni tsha ba dang gcod par byed pa
T13D4312-3:288a-0: yin te / de dag la lcags kyi @288a * //
T13D4312-3:288a-1: khams las byung ba ni shin tu yang bsngags pa yin no //
T13D4312-3:288a-2: ba gcin dri bro gnag pa dang //
T13D4312-3:288a-3: gu gul 'dra zhing gseg ma med //
T13D4312-3:288a-4: sbyin bag snum zhing skyur ba dang //
T13D4312-3:288a-5: bska zhing 'jam la lci ba yi //
T13D4312-3:288a-6: brag zhun de ni mchog yin no //
T13D4312-3:288a-8: brag zhun gang dri ni ba gcin dang 'dra la /
T13D4312-3:288a-9: kha dog ni gnag pa mtshan nyid gu gul 'dra
T13D4312-3:288a-10: zhing rdo phye'i gseg ma med pa mnyes na spyin
T13D4312-3:288a-11: bag tu 'dug cing snum pa ro skyur zhing bska
T13D4312-3:288a-12: ba rang bzhin 'jam zhing lci bas de ni brag
T13D4312-3:288a-13: zhun kyi dam pa yin no //
T13D4312-3:288a-14: nad dang nad pa rjes mthun par //
T13D4312-3:288a-15: sman dang brag zhun cha mnyam byas //
T13D4312-3:288a-16: lcags kyi snod du sbyar bar bya //
T13D4312-3:288a-18: brag zhun de nad pa dang nad pa'i goms pa'i
T13D4312-3:288a-19: tshul gang dag yin pa shes par byas la lcags
T13D4312-3:288a-20: kyi snod du sbyar bar bya'o //
T13D4312-3:288a-21: dang por chu ni nyi tshes bkru //
T13D4312-3:288a-22: de 'og bskams la bskol dang bsre //
T13D4312-3:288a-24: brag zhun de dang por ni chu 'ba' zhig gis bkrus la /
T13D4312-3:288a-25: de'i 'og tu bskams te bskol ba dang bsre bar bya'o //
T13D4312-3:288a-26: brag zhun sman dang mnyam byas la //
T13D4312-3:288a-27: brgyad cha'i nang du bskol bar bya //
T13D4312-3:288a-29: bsres pa'i brag zhun gyi 'phrod kyi sman dang brag
T13D4312-3:288a-30: zhun cha mnyam par byas la chu de'i brgyad 'gyur
T13D4312-3:288a-31: gyi nang du bskol bar bya'o //
T13D4312-3:288a-32: de la gal te brag zhun srang gcig dang sbyar
T13D4312-3:288a-33: na de'i 'phrod kyi sman yang srang gcig la sbyar
T13D4312-3:288a-34: la de chu brgyad 'gyur dang bskol bar bya'o //
T13D4312-3:288a-35: khu ba brgyad cha lus btsags pa //
T13D4312-3:288a-36: dro 'jam nang du brag zhun gzhug / ces bya ba la /
T13D4312-3:288a-37: khu ba bskol ba de brgyad cha lus pa dang
T13D4312-3:288a-38: btsags pa dro 'jam tsam gyi nang du brag zhun
T13D4312-3:288a-39: gzhug par bya'o // de dang 'dres gyur bskams nas ni //
T13D4312-3:288a-40: sman chu'i nang du slar yang gzhug / ces bya ba la /
T13D4312-3:288a-41: brag zhun 'dres par gyur te de bskams nas slar yang gzhug par bya'o //
T13D4312-3:288a-42: de ltar rang rang sman 'phrod ni //
T13D4312-3:288a-43: bskol ba'i khu bar lan bdun spangs //
T13D4312-3:288a-45: tshul de ltar rang gi sman 'phrod pa'i khu ba
T13D4312-3:288a-46: dang lan bdun gyi bar du spangs shing bsre bar
T13D4312-3:288a-47: bya'o // de nas tig ta'i sman mar gyis //
T13D4312-3:288a-48: snum chos byas nas sbyar byas te //
T13D4312-3:288a-49: 'bras bu gsum gyi khu ba dang //
T13D4312-3:288b-0: @288b shing mngar pa to la'i khu ba //
T13D4312-3:288b-1: brag zhun dag ni re re yang //
T13D4312-3:288b-2: zhag gsum bar du blud par bya //
T13D4312-3:288b-4: de nas de ltar snum chos byas pa'i mi de
T13D4312-3:288b-5: la tig ta'i sman mar zhag gsum gyi bar du
T13D4312-3:288b-6: sbyin par bya'o // de bzhin du brag zhun dang /
T13D4312-3:288b-7: 'bras bu gsum gyi khu ba dang /
T13D4312-3:288b-8: shing mngar gyi khu ba dang /
T13D4312-3:288b-9: pa to la'i khu ba zhag gsum gyi bar du blud par bya'o //
T13D4312-3:288b-10: de nas de la sbyor ba ni //
T13D4312-3:288b-11: dus dang sbyar te blud par bya //

T13D4312-3:288b-14: ba dus dang sbyar te sman bas blud par bya'o
T13D4312-3:288b-15: // de ltar brag zhun mi rnams la ;

T13D4312-3:288b-20: tshul de ltar brag zhun bsten zhing goms par byed
T13D4312-3:288b-21: pa dag ni shin tu phan par byed pa yin
T13D4312-3:288b-22: la / de bzhin du bcud kyis len gyi yon tan ma lus pa yang skyed par byed la /
T13D4312-3:288b-23: 'phral du de'i mod la gnod pa yang skyed par mi byed pa yin no //
T13D4312-3:288b-24: zhag bdun phrag gcig phrag gsum dang //

T13D4312-3:288b-26: brag zhun go rims bzhin du sbyar //
T13D4312-3:288b-28: brag zhun zhag bdun phrag gcig dang /
T13D4312-3:288b-29: tshad zho gnyis ni dman pa'i tshad yin no //
T13D4312-3:288b-30: zhag bdun phrag bdun dang srang gcig ni phyed tshad yin no //
T13D4312-3:288b-31: lus ni shin tu sbyangs byas la //
T13D4312-3:288b-32: brag zhun sbyangs pa gtang bar bya //
T13D4312-3:288b-33: zangs dang lcags dang dngul dang gser //
T13D4312-3:288b-34: kun dang yang na re rer sbyar //
T13D4312-3:288b-35: 'o ma dang ni lhan cig gtang //
T13D4312-3:288b-38: brag zhun ni lus shin tu sbyangs par gyur pa
T13D4312-3:288b-39: la brag zhun legs par sbyangs shing btul ba gtang
T13D4312-3:288b-40: bar bya la / de bzhin du zangs la sogs pa sna re 'am /
T13D4312-3:288b-41: kun dang yang sbyar bar bya zhing 'o ma dang
T13D4312-3:288b-42: lhan cig btang na bcud kyis len gyi 'bras bu
T13D4312-3:288b-43: gang dag yin pa 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T13D4312-3:288b-44: rgya sran mon sne'u dme ru dang //
T13D4312-3:288b-45: phug ron sha ni rtag tu spang //
T13D4312-3:288b-47: brag zhun gyi sbyor ba bsten pa'i dus su rgya sran la sogs pa rtag tu spang bar bya'o //
T13D4312-3:288b-48: gang zhig brag zhun gyis ni mngon sum du //
T13D4312-3:289a-0: @289a * // ma bsal nad ni sa steng yod ma yin //
T13D4312-3:289a-1: dus su cho ga bzhin du bsten gyur na //
T13D4312-3:289a-2: nad med nyams stobs rgya chen skyed par byed //
T13D4312-3:289a-4: mi yul sa steng 'di na brag zhun gyi sman
T13D4312-3:289a-5: gyis mngon du ma bcom pa'i nad ni yod pa
T13D4312-3:289a-6: ma yin la / de bzhin du de'i cho ga
T13D4312-3:289a-7: bzhin du bsten na nad med pa la sogs pa'i
T13D4312-3:289a-8: yon tan skyed par byed do //
T13D4312-3:289a-9: khang par gnas pa'i khom ldan can //
T13D4312-3:289a-10: phun sum tshogs dang ldan la phan //
T13D4312-3:289a-11: de las gzhan du de rnams la //
T13D4312-3:289a-12: nyi ma rlung gi tshe na bsten //
T13D4312-3:289a-14: khang par gnas pa la sogs pa khom ldan yod
T13D4312-3:289a-15: cing 'khor dang yo byad phun sum tshogs pa dang
T13D4312-3:289a-16: ldan pa la ni phan par gyur pa yin la
T13D4312-3:289a-18: khang par gnas pa la sogs pa'i khom ldan med
T13D4312-3:289a-19: pa la ni nyi ma dang rlung la gnas pa'i
T13D4312-3:289a-20: tshul gyis bsten na phan par 'gyur ro //
T13D4312-3:289a-21: rlung dang nyi tshan bcas sbyor ba //
T13D4312-3:289a-22: bde ba'i longs spyod med na yang //
T13D4312-3:289a-23: gang zhig lus la mi gnod pa //
T13D4312-3:289a-24: mchog tu de ni bshad par bya //
T13D4312-3:289a-26: da ni rlung dang nyi tshan dang bcas par yang
T13D4312-3:289a-27: bsten du rung ba'i sbyor ba bde ba'i longs spyod
T13D4312-3:289a-28: las nyams su zin kyang lus la gnod par mi
T13D4312-3:289a-29: 'gyur ba'i spyor ba'i mchog de bshad par bya'o //
T13D4312-3:289a-30: chu grang 'o ma sbrang rtsi dang //
T13D4312-3:289a-31: mar ni re re gnyis gnyis dang //
T13D4312-3:289a-32: gsum mam yang na thams cad dang //
T13D4312-3:289a-33: zas sngar 'thungs na rgas sra byed //
T13D4312-3:289a-35: chu grang la sogs pa re re 'am /
T13D4312-3:289a-38: bzhi char kun zas kyi sngar 'thungs na yang rgas sra bar byed do //
T13D4312-3:289a-39: bu ram sbrang rtsi bca' sga dang //
T13D4312-3:289a-40: pi pi ling ngam rgyam tsha dang //
T13D4312-3:289a-41: aa ru ra ni gnyis gnyis dag / rtag zos bdo zhing lo brgyar 'tsho //
T13D4312-3:289a-43: bu ram la sogs pa gang yang rung ba dang /
T13D4312-3:289a-44: aa ru ra gnyis gnyis rtag tu zos na yang
T13D4312-3:289a-45: mi de lo brgya'i bar du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro
T13D4312-3:289a-46: // aa ru ra ni mar nang bsros //
T13D4312-3:289a-47: bza' zhing mar de 'thungs na ni //
T13D4312-3:289a-48: rgas sra lus ni yun ring gnas //
T13D4312-3:289a-50: ji ltar dam pa byas gzo ba //
T13D4312-3:289b-0: lan cig phan gdags ji lta @289b bzhin //
T13D4312-3:289b-2: aa ru ra mar gyi nang du bsros te bza'
T13D4312-3:289b-3: ba dang bsros pa'i mar de 'thungs par gyur na
T13D4312-3:289b-4: lus rgas sra ba la sogs par 'gyur ro //
T13D4312-3:289b-5: ji ltar byas ba gzo ba'i mi la phan btags
T13D4312-3:289b-6: na de'i mi brjed par sems la 'jog pa dang
T13D4312-3:289b-7: 'dra'o // skyu ru ra'i khu sbrang rtsi dang //
T13D4312-3:289b-8: kha ra mar dang lde gur byas //
T13D4312-3:289b-9: bsten zhing 'phrod pa za ba'i mi //
T13D4312-3:289b-11: nyes bsrung bstan bcos rgya chen mtshungs //
T13D4312-3:289b-13: skyu ru ra'i khu ba dang sbrang rtsi dang mar
T13D4312-3:289b-14: dang kha ra lde gur byas pa zos shing kha
T13D4312-3:289b-15: zas 'phrod pa la bsten pa'i mi rgas pa'i gnod
T13D4312-3:289b-16: pa gang yin pa de 'jig par 'gyur te /
T13D4312-3:289b-17: ji ltar bstan bcos rgya chen po legs par bzung
T13D4312-3:289b-18: nas brjed du mi rung bar 'gyur ba dang mtshungs
T13D4312-3:289b-19: so // skyu ru ra dang byi dang ga / aa sa na yi snying po phye //
T13D4312-3:289b-20: lcags phye til mar sbrang rtsi yi //
T13D4312-3:289b-21: mar bcas lde gu bsten na ni //
T13D4312-3:289b-22: na tshod mdzes pa ma nyams 'gyur //
T13D4312-3:289b-24: skyu ru ra la sogs pa ji skad smos pa
T13D4312-3:289b-25: bzhin bsten na yang na tshod mdzes pa la sogs
T13D4312-3:289b-26: par 'gyur ro // lcags phye byi dang ga yi bye ma dang //
T13D4312-3:289b-27: mar dang sbrang rtsir bcas pa lo gcig tsam //
T13D4312-3:289b-28: aa sa na yi za ma tog nang gzhug /
T13D4312-3:289b-29: bsten na stobs ldan tshe ring skra gnag 'gyur //
T13D4312-3:289b-31: lcags nag po'i phye ma la sogs pa ji skad
T13D4312-3:289b-32: smos pa bzhin du bsten na yang tshe ring zhing
T13D4312-3:289b-34: byi dang ga dang go bye bca' sga rnams //
T13D4312-3:289b-35: mar dang sbrang rtsir bcas pa gang gis zos //
T13D4312-3:289b-36: rgas pa'i chu bo nad kyi rba rlabs can //
T13D4312-3:289b-37: na tshod ldan pa'i skyes bu de rgal 'gyur //
T13D4312-3:289b-39: mi gang byi dang ga la sogs pa'i lde gu
T13D4312-3:289b-40: zos pa de ni na tshod dar la bab pa
T13D4312-3:289b-42: rgas pa'i chu bo'i rba rlabs las nges par rgal bar 'gyur ro //
T13D4312-3:289b-43: seng ldeng aa sa na yi khu ba dang //
T13D4312-3:289b-44: 'bras bu gsum dang sbrang rtsi mar sbyar ba //
T13D4312-3:289b-45: cho ga bzhin du bsten pa'i mi rnams ni //
T13D4312-3:289b-46: tshe ring 'gyur ba 'di las ngo mtshar med //
T13D4312-3:289b-48: seng ldeng la sogs pa'i lde gu bsten na yang nges par tshe ring bar 'gyur ba yin no //
T13D4312-3:289b-49: dzi ba ka yi khu ba sor mor chags //
T13D4312-3:290a-1: sbrang rtsi mar dang 'bras bu gsum //
T13D4312-3:290a-2: skyes bu dam pas bsten par gyur na ni //
T13D4312-3:290a-3: rgas dang nad ni nges par bzlog par 'gyur //
T13D4312-3:290a-5: dzi ba ka zhes bya ba aa sa na'i khu

T13D4312-3:290a-7: pa la sogs pa'i 'tshe ba med par 'gyur ro

T13D4312-3:290a-9: 'o mar btags pa zla phyed zla ba gnyis //
T13D4312-3:290a-10: zla drug lo gcig bar du 'thungs na ni //

T13D4312-3:290a-12: zhes bya ba la ba spru ba zhes bya ba

T13D4312-3:290a-20: pri yang ku dang tsandan re re yi //
T13D4312-3:290a-21: cho ga'ang ba spru ba dang mtshungs pa yin //
T13D4312-3:290a-23: mur ba la sogs pa sman sna re re zhing
T13D4312-3:290a-24: yang ba sbru ba'i cho ga bzhin bsten na yon
T13D4312-3:290a-25: tan de dang mtshungs pa yin no //
T13D4312-3:290a-26: nye'u shing lde gu khu bar bskol ba dang //
T13D4312-3:290a-27: zhun mar kha rar bcas pa za byed pa //
T13D4312-3:290a-28: de ni 'tsho ba'i lam du zhugs gyur tshe //
T13D4312-3:290a-29: nad kyi rkun pos choms par mi 'gyur ro //
T13D4312-3:290a-31: nye'u shing gi lde gu dang khu ba bskol ba'i
T13D4312-3:290a-32: sman mar gyi nang du kha ra btab ste zos
T13D4312-3:290a-33: na mi 'tsho ba'i lam du zhugs par gyur pa'i
T13D4312-3:290a-34: tshe srog 'phrog par byed pa'i nad kyi rkun pos
T13D4312-3:290a-37: aa shva gandha 'o mar bcas pa ni //
T13D4312-3:290a-38: mar ram til mar chu dron sbyar ba dang //
T13D4312-3:290a-39: zla phyed bsten na nyam chung lus rgyas shing //
T13D4312-3:290a-40: ji ltar lo tog gzhon la char bab mtshungs //
T13D4312-3:290a-45: chu dron dang sbyar te 'thungs na ni lus shin
T13D4312-3:290a-46: tu nyam chung ba yang rgyas shing 'phel bar 'gyur
T13D4312-3:290a-47: ro // ji ltar lo tog shin tu gzhon pa la char bab pa dang mtshungs so //
T13D4312-3:290a-48: nyin re til nag srang ni re re dag / zos pa'i rjes la chu grang 'thungs gyur na //
T13D4312-3:290a-49: lus ni shas cher rgyas pa nyid 'gyur zhing //
T13D4312-3:290a-50: 'chi ba'i bar du so ni brtan par 'gyur //
T13D4312-3:290b-0: til nag po nyin re srang re zos la @290b
T13D4312-3:290b-1: de'i 'og tu chu grang 'thungs par gyur na mi'i
T13D4312-3:290b-2: lus shas cher rgyas par 'gyur zhing rtag tu so
T13D4312-3:290b-4: gze ma sle tres skyu ru ra'i phye ma //
T13D4312-3:290b-5: mar dang sbrang rtsi cha mnyam lde gu zos //
T13D4312-3:290b-6: ro tsa lus brtan nad kyi sdug bsngal zhi //
T13D4312-3:290b-7: lo brgyar 'tsho zhing skra ni nag por 'gyur //
T13D4312-3:290b-9: gze ma la sogs pa'i lde gu zos na yang
T13D4312-3:290b-10: ro tsa ba la sogs pa'i yon tan skyed do
T13D4312-3:290b-11: // til nag aa ru ra dang skyu ru ra //
T13D4312-3:290b-12: ba ru ra dang bcas pa brdungs nas bsten //
T13D4312-3:290b-13: mi de rma bya lta bur mdangs ldan zhing //
T13D4312-3:290b-14: yid du 'ong ba'i bde ba 'thob par 'gyur //
T13D4312-3:290b-15: brag zhun mar dang sbrang rtsi byi dang ga / aa ru ra dang lcags phye dngul chu dang //
T13D4312-3:290b-16: ta bya bsten na lus zungs rdzogs 'gyur te //
T13D4312-3:290b-17: yar do zla phyed rdzogs pa'i zla ba 'dra //
T13D4312-3:290b-19: skyes bu gang til dang lhan cig tu skyu ru
T13D4312-3:290b-20: ra la sogs pa brdungs pa bcas te zos na
T13D4312-3:290b-21: yang mi de ji skad smos pa'i mdangs dang ldan
T13D4312-3:290b-22: par 'gyur la ; de bzhin du brag zhun la
T13D4312-3:290b-23: sogs pa zos na yang lus zungs zla ba yar
T13D4312-3:290b-24: gyi ngo ltar rgyas par 'gyur ro //
T13D4312-3:290b-25: gang zhig bring ga ra dza'i khu ba zla ba
T13D4312-3:290b-26: gcig / nyin re rgyun du bsten par byed pa
T13D4312-3:290b-27: dang // 'o ma 'thungs ste stobs dang brtson 'grus ldan //
T13D4312-3:290b-28: lo brgyar 'tsho ba dag kyang thob par 'gyur //
T13D4312-3:290b-30: skyes bu gang bring gar dza bskol ba'i khu ba
T13D4312-3:290b-31: nyin re zhing zla ba gcig gi bar du 'thung
T13D4312-3:290b-32: bar byed pa dang 'o ma 'thungs pa de ni
T13D4312-3:290b-33: stobs la sogs pa 'thob par 'gyur ro //
T13D4312-3:290b-34: shu dag kyang ni zla ba gcig bsten zhing //
T13D4312-3:290b-35: 'o ma'am mar ram til mar bcas pa bsten //
T13D4312-3:290b-36: gdon gyis mi tshugs pa yi lus 'gyur zhing //
T13D4312-3:290b-37: yid gzhungs tshig ni shin tu gsal bar 'gyur //
T13D4312-3:290b-39: mi gang zla ba gcig gi bar du shu dag
T13D4312-3:290b-40: 'o ma 'am mar dang til mar dang bcas par
T13D4312-3:290b-41: bsten na gdon gyis mi tshugs pa la sogs pa'i
T13D4312-3:290b-43: man du ka parni ni mar dang brdos //
T13D4312-3:290b-44: zla gcig bar du zas ma zos par bsten //
T13D4312-3:290b-45: gzugs ni rgya cher 'tsho zhing spobs pa che //
T13D4312-3:290b-46: gzhon zhing mdangs ldan yon tan ldan par 'gyur //
T13D4312-3:290b-48: man du ka parni zhes bya ba sman mar dang
T13D4312-3:290b-49: brdos pa zla ba gcig gi bar du zos na
T13D4312-3:291a-1: du 'tsho zhing spobs pa che ba la sogs par 'gyur ro //
T13D4312-3:291a-2: 'bras bu gsum dang tsang gi ri dang ni //
T13D4312-3:291a-3: lcags phye srang ni lnga bcu las byas shing //
T13D4312-3:291a-4: ko sha da ki'i khu ba'i nang du btags //
T13D4312-3:291a-5: ri lu sum brgya byas nas ri lu de //
T13D4312-3:291a-6: grib mar bskams te rim gyis ma lus par //
T13D4312-3:291a-7: bkru sman bya zhing thug sla'i rim pa dang //
T13D4312-3:291a-8: thug ska gar po sha khu 'bras chen dang //
T13D4312-3:291a-9: mar la bsten zhing zla gcig lus bsdams la //
T13D4312-3:291a-10: zla gcig 'das nas rang dga' nyid du spyad //
T13D4312-3:291a-11: 'bad pas dus kun du ni ma zhu spang //
T13D4312-3:291a-12: lo gcig bar du sbyor ba 'di bsten na //
T13D4312-3:291a-13: gang zhig gso dka'i nad kyis nyen pa yang //
T13D4312-3:291a-14: shin tu stobs che skyes bu'i bya ba rdzogs //
T13D4312-3:291a-15: lus rgyas 'jam zhing mig dang rna ba gsal //
T13D4312-3:291a-16: gzhon pa nyid dang lo ni lnga brgyar 'tsho //
T13D4312-3:291a-20: lcags kyi phye ma tshad srang lnga bcu ko sha
T13D4312-3:291a-21: ta ka'i khu ba'i nang du btags pa las ril
T13D4312-3:291a-22: bur sbyar te grib mar bskams nas de ma lus
T13D4312-3:291a-23: par zos la / bkru sman dang thug pa'i rim
T13D4312-3:291a-24: pa lnga la sogs pa'i tshul gyis zla ba gcig
T13D4312-3:291a-25: 'das par byas nas de'i 'og tu spyod pa bsdams
T13D4312-3:291a-26: pa med pas gnas par bya ste /
T13D4312-3:291a-27: 'dir ni rnam pa thams cad du ma zhu ba'i bag spang par bya'o //
T13D4312-3:291a-28: tshul de ltar sbyor ba 'dis lo gcig gi bar
T13D4312-3:291a-29: du bsten na gso dka' ba'i nad kyang sel ba
T13D4312-3:291a-30: la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan par 'gyur ro
T13D4312-3:291a-31: // seng ldeng shir sha ba dang aa sa na //
T13D4312-3:291a-32: rma bya aa ru ra dang skyu ru ra //
T13D4312-3:291a-33: go bye byi dang ga btags chu 'gyur ni //
T13D4312-3:291a-34: bco brgyad nang bskol lcags kyi dum bu bcug / lcags kyi snod du zhag gsum nyi ma yi //
T13D4312-3:291a-35: 'od kyis bsros la de rjes me la ni //
T13D4312-3:291a-36: lcags kyi phye ma zhib par byas te bskol //
T13D4312-3:291a-37: de btsags khu ba cha gcig 'o ma ni //
T13D4312-3:291a-38: cha gcig de bzhin gso ma'i khu ba gcig /
T13D4312-3:291a-39: nye'u shing bskol ba'i khu ba cha gsum dang //
T13D4312-3:291a-40: 'dir ni mar sar cha ni bzhi dang sbyar //
T13D4312-3:291a-41: 'di dag gcig tu lcags nag snod du bskol //
T13D4312-3:291a-42: kha ra rdul med de bzhin sbrang rtsi dang //
T13D4312-3:291a-43: de bzhin mar dang bsres par gyur pa dang //
T13D4312-3:291a-44: 'phrod pa'i zas dang skom dang spyod lam bcas //
T13D4312-3:291b-0: srang re @291b rtag tu bsten par gyur na ni //
T13D4312-3:291b-1: dpal dang ldan zhing nyes pa bsal ba dang //
T13D4312-3:291b-2: nags kyi ma he lta bu'i stobs ldan zhing //
T13D4312-3:291b-3: rta ltar mgyogs la lus ni brtan pa dang //
T13D4312-3:291b-4: skra ni bung ba'i mdog ltar gnag pa dang //
T13D4312-3:291b-5: kha ni dri zhim bud med mang bsten nus //
T13D4312-3:291b-6: tshig gsal yid gzhungs phun sum tshogs pa dang //
T13D4312-3:291b-7: zla gcig bsten na me drod che ba yin //
T13D4312-3:291b-8: de ni mi yi seng ge'am me'am ni //
T13D4312-3:291b-9: btso ma gser gyi mdog 'dra'i lus 'dzin gyur //
T13D4312-3:291b-10: mi yi seng ge'i sbyor ba 'di //
T13D4312-3:291b-11: zos na nad kyis mi nyen te //
T13D4312-3:291b-15: seng ldeng la sogs pa cha mnyam par byas te btags la /
T13D4312-3:291b-16: sman gyi bco brgyad 'gyur nang du bskol la lcags kyi dum bu bcug ste /
T13D4312-3:291b-17: lcags kyi snod kyi nang du bzhag la nyi ma gsum du nyi ma'i 'od kyis bsros la /
T13D4312-3:291b-18: de'i rjes la me chung du la de bzhi cha lus kyi bar du bskol la /
T13D4312-3:291b-19: de btsags nas cha gcig tu byas pa dang /
T13D4312-3:291b-20: 'o ma'i cha yang de dang mnyam pa dang /
T13D4312-3:291b-21: de bzhin du gso ma'i khu ba'i cha dang mnyam pa dang /
T13D4312-3:291b-22: de bzhin du nye'u shing gi khu ba cha gsum dang /
T13D4312-3:291b-23: mar sar bzhi cha ste de thams cad gcig tu
T13D4312-3:291b-24: bsdus la lcags kyi snod chen po'i nang du sman
T13D4312-3:291b-26: der yang kha ra dkar po nag nog med pa dang /
T13D4312-3:291b-27: sbrang rtsi la sogs pa bcug la de las srang
T13D4312-3:291b-28: re bsten na dpal dang ldan pa la sogs pa'i
T13D4312-3:291b-29: yon tan dang ldan zhing yid gzhungs pa phun sum
T13D4312-3:291b-31: sbyor ba de zla ba gcig gi bar du bsten
T13D4312-3:291b-32: na me drod che ba la sogs pa'i yon tan
T13D4312-3:291b-34: 'di ni mi'i seng ge zhes bya ba khyab 'jug gis bshad pa'i sbyor ba yin te /
T13D4312-3:291b-35: 'di zos na nad kyi tshogs kyis nyen par mi 'gyur te /
T13D4312-3:291b-36: ji ltar khyab 'jug 'khor lo 'bar ba lag na
T13D4312-3:291b-37: thogs pas lha ma yin gyi tshogs 'jigs shing 'byer
T13D4312-3:291b-39: bring gar dza myu gu'i cho ga 'dis //
T13D4312-3:291b-40: brngos shing mar bcas zos la bsdams dang bcas //
T13D4312-3:291b-41: lto sbyangs pa la aa sa na'i khu ba //
T13D4312-3:291b-42: 'o ma 'thung zhing zas kyi bya ba byed //
T13D4312-3:292a-2: bde zhing lo ni nyis brgya'i bar du 'tsho //
T13D4312-3:292a-3: lan cig smras pa'i tshig kyang zin gyur zhing //
T13D4312-3:292a-4: dran dang dbang po nyams pa med par 'gyur //
T13D4312-3:292a-6: bring gar dza'i myu gu mar dang brngos pa la
T13D4312-3:292a-7: sogs pa'i sbyor bas zla ba gcig gi bar du
T13D4312-3:292a-8: bsten na bde zhing lo nyis brgya'i bar du 'tsho
T13D4312-3:292a-9: ba la sogs pa 'thob par 'gyur ro //
T13D4312-3:292a-10: gang zhig sbyor ba 'di yis ni //
T13D4312-3:292a-11: til mar bsten par byed pa dag / de yis yon tan de thob cing //
T13D4312-3:292a-12: lus ni nag po nyid du 'gyur //
T13D4312-3:292a-14: sngar bshad pa'i sbyor ba 'di nyid kyis mar ji
T13D4312-3:292a-15: ltar bskol ba de bzhin du til mar bskol la
T13D4312-3:292a-16: bsten par byed pa de yang yon tan sngar ji
T13D4312-3:292a-17: skad smos pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro //
T13D4312-3:292a-18: 'on kyang khyad par ni til mar gyi sbyor bas lus nag po nyid du 'gyur ro //
T13D4312-3:292a-19: bcud kyis len ni dus dang rjes mthun zhing //
T13D4312-3:292a-20: bsten nus 'bras bur bcas pa bshad pa yin //
T13D4312-3:292a-21: gzhan dag phan yon bcas pa yod mod kyi //
T13D4312-3:292a-22: rnyed par dka' bas bdag gis ma bshad do //
T13D4312-3:292a-24: bcud kyis len da ltar gyi dus dang rjes su mthun zhing /
T13D4312-3:292a-25: bsten cing spyad par nus pa 'bras bu dang bcas
T13D4312-3:292a-26: pa gang dag yin pa de bdag gis bshad pa
T13D4312-3:292a-27: yin gyi / bcud kyis len gyi sbyor ba gzhan
T13D4312-3:292a-28: dag phan yon dang bcas pa mang po drang srong
T13D4312-3:292a-29: rnams kyis bshad pa yod mod kyi /
T13D4312-3:292a-30: de ni rnyed pa dang bsgrub par dka' ba yin pas bdag gis 'dir ma bshad do //
T13D4312-3:292a-31: bcud kyis len gyi cho ga las //
T13D4312-3:292a-32: nyams pas gal te nad skye na //
T13D4312-3:292a-33: bcud kyis len de spangs nas ni //
T13D4312-3:292a-34: de yi sman ni ji bzhin bya //
T13D4312-3:292a-36: bcud kyis len gyi cho ga bstan pa las legs par ma spyad pa nyams par gyur te /
T13D4312-3:292a-37: gal te nad skyes na bcud kyis len gyi cho
T13D4312-3:292a-38: ga de spangs shing dor la nad ni de'i sman
T13D4312-3:292a-39: ji lta ba bzhin du bya'o //
T13D4312-3:292a-40: bden par smra zhing khro ba med //
T13D4312-3:292a-41: dbang po bsdams shing bdag nyid thul //
T13D4312-3:292a-42: zhi zhing dam pa'i spyod la dga' //
T13D4312-3:292a-43: rtag tu bcud len yin zhes bya //
T13D4312-3:292a-45: mi rtag par bden par smra ba dang //
T13D4312-3:292a-46: de bzhin du khro ba med pa dang /
T13D4312-3:292b-0: dbang po bsdams @292b shing yul la mi g-yeng bar bdag nyid thul ba dang /
T13D4312-3:292b-2: dam pa'i spyod lam la dga' ba rnams ni rtag tu bcud gyis len yin par shes par bya'o //
T13D4312-3:292b-3: yon tan 'di dag ldan gyur pas //
T13D4312-3:292b-4: gang zhig bcud len bsten gyur pa //
T13D4312-3:292b-5: de ni dga' zhing tshe ring la //
T13D4312-3:292b-8: bden par smra ba la sogs pa'i yon tan 'di dag dang ldan pas /
T13D4312-3:292b-9: mi gang zhig bcud kyis len bsten zhing spyod par
T13D4312-3:292b-10: byed pa de dag ni bde zhing dga' ba dang
T13D4312-3:292b-12: 'jig rten 'di dang 'jig rten gzhan dag tu bde
T13D4312-3:292b-13: ba phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro
T13D4312-3:292b-14: // spyod pa bstan bcos rjes 'jug cing //
T13D4312-3:292b-15: gam na gnas pa'i sems dang mthun //
T13D4312-3:292b-16: don la blo ni mi 'khrugs la //
T13D4312-3:292b-17: bcud kyis len ni rdzogs pa yin //
T13D4312-3:292b-19: mi gang gi spyod pa bsten bcos las ji skad ston pa'i rjes su 'jug par byed pa dang /
T13D4312-3:292b-20: gang na nye 'khor du gnas pa'i grogs kyi sems dang rjes su mthun par 'jug pa dang /
T13D4312-3:292b-21: de bzhin du gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa'i don
T13D4312-3:292b-22: la blo ma 'khrugs par gyur pa gang yin pa
T13D4312-3:292b-23: de ni bcud kyis len yongs su rdzogs pa yin
T13D4312-3:292b-25: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa
T13D4312-3:292b-26: tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba slob
T13D4312-3:292b-27: dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar ba
T13D4312-3:292b-28: las / phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u sum cu rtsa dgu pa'i rnam par 'grel pa'o /
T13D4312-3:292b-30: // / de nas ro tsa bar bya ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o //
T13D4312-3:292b-31: skyes bus rtag tu yul bsten pas //
T13D4312-3:292b-32: ro tsa bar ni 'dod bya ste //
T13D4312-3:292b-33: dga' dang brta dang bu rgyud ni //
T13D4312-3:292b-34: yon tan ldan pas de la gnas //
T13D4312-3:292b-36: skyes bu rtag tu yul bsten par byed pas ro
T13D4312-3:292b-37: tsa bar bya ba'i sman 'dod par bya zhing de
T13D4312-3:292b-39: gang gi phyir ro tsa bar bya ba'i cho ga
T13D4312-3:292b-40: de la ni dga' ba dang lus rgyas shing brta
T13D4312-3:292b-41: ba dang / yon tan dang ldan pa'i bu rgyud
T13D4312-3:292b-42: 'phel bar bya ba dag de la gnas pa yin
T13D4312-3:292b-43: ba dang / no // bu tsha'i rgyud ni skyed byed cing //
T13D4312-3:292b-44: 'phral du yang dag dga' byed gang //
T13D4312-3:292b-45: gang gis rta ltar rab stobs ldan //
T13D4312-3:293a-2: bud med la rab chags 'gyur ba //
T13D4312-3:293a-4: de ni ro tsa byed pa ste //
T13D4312-3:293a-5: lus kyi stobs kyang skyed pa'i mchog / ces bya ba la /
T13D4312-3:293a-6: bcud kyis len gang bu tsha'i rgyud ni skyed cing mi rabs gnas par byed pa dang /
T13D4312-3:293a-7: gang 'phral du yang dga' zhing bde bar byed pa dang /
T13D4312-3:293a-8: dngos po gang zhig bsten pas bud med la 'jug par byed pa'i nus pa dang ldan te /
T13D4312-3:293a-9: ji ltar rta 'dod pa spyod pa la nus pa dang ldan pa lta bur 'gyur zhing /
T13D4312-3:293a-10: gang zhig la gnas na bud med la rab tu
T13D4312-3:293a-11: chags par 'gyur ba de 'phel zhing rgyas par 'gyur
T13D4312-3:293a-12: ba gang yin pa de la ni ro tsa bar
T13D4312-3:293a-14: de ni lus kyi stobs dang gzi brjid skyed par byed pa'i mchog yin no //
T13D4312-3:293a-15: chos dang grags dang tshe ring dang //
T13D4312-3:293a-17: gcig tu skyon ni med pa yi //
T13D4312-3:293a-18: tshangs par spyod la bdag yi rang //
T13D4312-3:293a-20: gang zhig tshangs bar spyod pa gcig tu skyon med
T13D4312-3:293a-21: pa la gnas pa ni chos dang grags par 'gyur
T13D4312-3:293a-22: ba dang / tshe ring bar byed pa dang /
T13D4312-3:293a-23: 'jig rten 'di dang phyi mar bcud kyis len du
T13D4312-3:293a-24: gyur pa'i tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa la
T13D4312-3:293a-25: bdag shin tu yi rang ngo //
T13D4312-3:293a-26: snying stobs chung ba nyon mongs pas //
T13D4312-3:293a-27: gnod par gyur pa'i nad bu can //
T13D4312-3:293a-28: lus mi zad pa bsrung ba'i phyir //
T13D4312-3:293a-29: ro tsa'i cho ga brjod pa yin //
T13D4312-3:293a-31: sems can snying stobs chung ba dang /
T13D4312-3:293a-32: nyon mongs pa shas che bar gyur pa dang /
T13D4312-3:293a-33: nad bu can gyi 'dod pa spyad pas lus zad
T13D4312-3:293a-34: par 'gyur ba bsrung ba'i phyir ro tsa ba'i cho
T13D4312-3:293a-36: nad med lang tsho ldan pa dang //
T13D4312-3:293a-37: ro tsa ba ni bsten byed pa //

T13D4312-3:296a-25: rang bzhin na tshod mtshungs shing dbang gyur grogs //
T13D4312-3:296a-27: grogs po mdza' bshes kyang bsku byug la sogs pa
T13D4312-3:296a-28: dang ldan zhing glu la sogs pa la mkhas pa
T13D4312-3:296a-29: / rang bzhin dang na tshod mnyam pa dang rang
T13D4312-3:296a-30: gi dbang du gyur pa yang yid dang mthun zhing
T13D4312-3:296a-31: mgu bar byed pa yin pas ro tsa bar byed
T13D4312-3:296a-32: pa yin no zhes bya ba nas bshad pa dang
T13D4312-3:296a-33: / sbyar ro // rang gi khang pa'i nye 'khor khrus rdzing bu //
T13D4312-3:296a-34: padma'i ge sar sbrang rtsis myos pa yi //
T13D4312-3:296a-35: sbrang ma bya dang bcas par gyur pa ni //
T13D4312-3:296a-36: sngo zhing gzhi mnyam ri yi 'dab na ni //
T13D4312-3:296a-37: nags tshal khyim dang nye bar 'gyur ba dang //
T13D4312-3:296a-39: rang gi khang pa'i nye 'khor na khrus kyi rdzing
T13D4312-3:296a-40: bu yid du 'ong ba padma'i ge sar gyi rdul
T13D4312-3:296a-41: las byung ba'i sbrang rtsis myos par gyur pa'i sbrang
T13D4312-3:296a-42: ma'i tshogs dang bcas pa yang yid du 'ong ba
T13D4312-3:296a-43: yin pas na ro tsa bar byed pa yin la
T13D4312-3:296a-44: / de bzhin du bya sna tshogs dang bcas pa'i
T13D4312-3:296b-0: nags tshal [?] @296b gzhi mnyam zhing yid du 'ong
T13D4312-3:296b-1: ba yang khyim gyi 'dab nye bar 'dug pa de
T13D4312-3:296b-2: yang nyams dga' bar byed pa yin pas na ro
T13D4312-3:296b-3: tsa bar byed pa yin no //
T13D4312-3:296b-4: mthong na dga' ba'i shing ni sna tshogs skyes //
T13D4312-3:296b-5: mnyan na bde ba'i khu byug sgra snyan sgrogs //
T13D4312-3:296b-6: lus bde bud med rgyan ldan dus dbang 'gyur //
T13D4312-3:296b-7: sems bde ma lus 'khor gyis bskor ba dang //
T13D4312-3:296b-9: skyed mos tshal mthong na nyams dga' zhing bde ba
T13D4312-3:296b-10: skyed pa sna tshogs pa mthong bas dga' ba skyed
T13D4312-3:296b-11: pa de yang ro tsa bar byed pa yin la
T13D4312-3:296b-12: / de bzhin du mnyan na bde ba'i sgra khu
T13D4312-3:296b-13: byug la sogs pa dag gi sgra yid du 'ong
T13D4312-3:296b-14: ba thos pa yang ro tsa bar byed pa yin
T13D4312-3:296b-15: / no // bud med rgyan gyis brgyan zhing dus
T13D4312-3:296b-16: kyi bde ba'i dbang du gyur pa skyed par byed
T13D4312-3:296b-17: pa yang ro tsa ba bskyed pa yin la /
T13D4312-3:296b-18: de bzhin du sems bde bar byed pa'i 'khor gyi tshogs kyis bskor te /
T13D4312-3:296b-19: gnas pa yang ro tsa bar byed pa'i rgyu yin no //
T13D4312-3:296b-20: so rtsi dang ni chang dang chung ma ni //
T13D4312-3:296b-21: yid 'ong mtshan mo zla zer bcas par 'dug / yid ni dga' bar byed pa gang dang gang //
T13D4312-3:296b-22: de dang de ni ro tsar byed pa yin //
T13D4312-3:296b-24: so rtsi tambu la zhes bya ba bsten zhing bza' ba dang chang dangs ma 'thung ba dang /
T13D4312-3:296b-25: chung ma yid du 'ong ba dang 'grogs shing mtshan
T13D4312-3:296b-26: mo zla zer dang bcas pa la 'dug pa yang
T13D4312-3:296b-27: ro tsa bar byed pa'i rgyu yin te /
T13D4312-3:296b-28: mdor na yid dga' bar byed pa gang dang gang
T13D4312-3:296b-29: yin pa de dag thams cad ro tsa bar byed
T13D4312-3:296b-30: pa yin no // chung ma'i kha ni autpa la ltar dri zhim //
T13D4312-3:296b-31: pi wang snyan pa'i sgra ni nyan byed dang //
T13D4312-3:296b-32: mal stan yid 'ong me tog gcal bkram pa //
T13D4312-3:296b-33: lcug ma me tog myu gus brgyan pa 'dra //
T13D4312-3:296b-35: chung ma'i kha autpa la ltar shin du dri zhim par byed pa dang /
T13D4312-3:296b-36: pi wang snyan pa'i sgra nyan par byed pa dang /
T13D4312-3:296b-37: de bzhin du mal stan yid du 'ong zhing me
T13D4312-3:296b-38: tog dri zhim pa'i gcal bkram pa lcug ma rtse
T13D4312-3:296b-39: mo me tog dang myu gus brgyan pa ltar yid
T13D4312-3:296b-40: du 'ong ba yang 'dod pa'i don yongs su rdzogs
T13D4312-3:296b-42: yul dang dus la gnod pa gang yang med //
T13D4312-3:296b-43: yul gyi yid la gnod pa chung ngu'ang med //

T13D4312-3:297a-1: pa yongs su rdzogs par byed //

T13D4312-3:297a-4: de bzhin du lus la gnod pa'i 'tshe ba gang yang med pa dang /
T13D4312-3:297a-5: de bzhin du gzugs la sogs pa'i yul gyi yid
T13D4312-3:297a-6: la gnod pa chung zad tsam yang med par gyur

T13D4312-3:297a-13: skom dad che la bong pa bsregs pa ni //
T13D4312-3:297a-14: chu yi nang du gsur ba'i dangs ma phan //
T13D4312-3:297a-15: slon la 'bras yos chu so'i nad brag zhun //
T13D4312-3:297a-16: gcin snyi skyu ru ra dang ser po gnyis //
T13D4312-3:297a-17: skya rbab nad la lcags kyi phye ma mchog //

T13D4312-3:302a-15: bya ba yin pa dang 'dra bar /
T13D4312-3:302a-16: 'di'i sbyor ba la yang yid ches pa nyid kyis bsgrub kyi /
T13D4312-3:302a-17: log par rtog pa'i dpyod pa dag ni yang mi bya'o //
T13D4312-3:302a-18: 'di bklags rtogs dang nyams blangs pas //
T13D4312-3:302a-19: tshe ring ba dang nad med dang //
T13D4312-3:302a-20: chos dang nor dang bde dang grags //
T13D4312-3:302a-23: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i sman dpyad kyi rgyud 'di bklags pa dang /
T13D4312-3:302a-24: rtogs shing khong du chud pa dang /
T13D4312-3:302a-25: sbyor ba ji skad smos pa dang nyams su blangs pa las tshe ring ba dang /
T13D4312-3:302a-27: chos dang nor dang bde bar 'gyur ba dang /
T13D4312-3:302a-28: grags par 'gyur ba nges par gdon mi za bar 'thob par 'gyur ro //
T13D4312-3:302a-29: 'di ni bltas na bsdus don rtogs nus pas //
T13D4312-3:302a-30: rang gi goms las sman pas bskyod mi nus //
T13D4312-3:302a-31: rgya chen rgyud gzhan dag las goms gyur pas //
T13D4312-3:302a-32: mi bskyod gyur gang de ni ngo mtshar med //
T13D4312-3:302a-34: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i gzhung
T13D4312-3:302a-35: 'di bklags shing bltas na bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i
T13D4312-3:302a-36: sman dpyad kyi bstan bcos kyi don rtogs shing shes
T13D4312-3:302a-38: de bzhin du rang gi goms pa'i las de yang
T13D4312-3:302a-39: dang yang du bstan zhing nyams su blangs par gyur
T13D4312-3:302a-40: pa'i las la sman pa 'di la ma brten pa
T13D4312-3:302a-41: gzhan dag gis bskyod par mi nus shing /
T13D4312-3:302a-42: the tshom gyis sun 'byin zhing rgol bas tshar bcad
T13D4312-3:302a-43: par mi nus so zhes bya ba'i don yin la
T13D4312-3:302a-44: / gal te sman dpyad kyi rgyud rgya chen po
T13D4312-3:302a-45: gzhan dag las dka' ba chen pos bslabs te byang
T13D4312-3:302a-46: / bar gyur nas / las la glags mi thod cing mi bskyod par gyur pa yod mod kyi /
T13D4312-3:302b-0: de lta bu gang yin pa de ni @302b 'bad
T13D4312-3:302b-1: pa chen po las byung ba yin pa'i 'bras bu
T13D4312-3:302b-2: yin pas ngo mtshar mi che'i /
T13D4312-3:302b-3: 'di ni tshegs chung dus goms pa chen po thob pa yin pas ngo mtshar che'o //
T13D4312-3:302b-4: gal te tsa ra kas ni bslabs gyur des ni legs thos sogs //
T13D4312-3:302b-5: las bshad nad kyi ming tsam yang ni shes par 'gyur ma yin //
T13D4312-3:302b-6: tsa ra ka lam bslabs gso ba dag ni ma goms pa'i //
T13D4312-3:302b-7: nyon mongs des ni nad pa rnams kyi gso ba ji ltar bya //
T13D4312-3:302b-9: gal te sman pa tsa ra ka 'ba' zhig bslabs
T13D4312-3:302b-10: shing byang bar byas par gyur pa des ni drang
T13D4312-3:302b-11: srong legs thos kyis byas pa la sogs pa'i gzhung
T13D4312-3:302b-12: las bshad pa'i nad kyi tshogs nad phran tshegs dang
T13D4312-3:302b-14: mig gi 'bras bu dkar nag dang /
T13D4312-3:302b-17: sna'i nad rnams kyi ming gi tha snyad tsam yang shes par 'gyur ba ma yin zhing /
T13D4312-3:302b-18: de yang phyi rol du gyur pa ma yin no //
T13D4312-3:302b-19: yang zhes bya ba'i sgras ni de'i nad gzhi dang
T13D4312-3:302b-20: mtshan nyid dang gso ba dag mi shes pa dag
T13D4312-3:302b-21: smos kyang ci dgos so zhes ston pa yin no
T13D4312-3:302b-22: // gal te zhes bya ba la ni phyogs gnyis pa ston pa'i phyir smos pa yin te /
T13D4312-3:302b-23: gal te tsa ra ka zhes bya bas gzhung la ma bslabs shing shes par ma gyur gyi /
T13D4312-3:302b-24: legs thos kyis bshad pa la sogs pa'i gzhung 'ba' zhig tsam bslabs par gyur na ni /
T13D4312-3:302b-25: nad gzhi dang lus zungs la sogs pa gnod par bya ba dang /
T13D4312-3:302b-31: rang bzhin la sogs pa dang 'brel pa'i gso ba'i
T13D4312-3:302b-32: bya ba la ma goms shing mi shes pa yin
T13D4312-3:302b-33: pas / de'i phyir nyon mongs pa'i shes pa dang
T13D4312-3:302b-34: mi ldan pa'i sman pa ngan pa des nad kyis
T13D4312-3:302b-35: gzir ba'i nad rnams la gso ba ji ltar bya
T13D4312-3:302b-36: pas / ste / de lta bus kyang nad bsal
T13D4312-3:302b-37: ba'i bya ba ci yang bya bar mi nus te
T13D4312-3:302b-38: pas / ste / / gso ba'i bya ba la ma bslabs pa'i phyir ro //
T13D4312-3:302b-39: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i snying po 'dir ni
T13D4312-3:302b-40: de gnyis ka'i don ston pa yin pas 'di la
T13D4312-3:302b-41: bslabs pas ni nges par nad gso bar nus pa
T13D4312-3:302b-42: yin no // mngon par zhen pa'i dbang gis legs par bshad par gyur pa 'ang //
T13D4312-3:302b-43: shin tu rmongs bas mngon par spyad par mi byed gang yin de //
T13D4312-3:302b-44: de ni dang bor sman dpyad bstan bcos skyon med bklags gyur zhing //
T13D4312-3:303a-0: skyes bu'i tshe yis ji srid thub kyi @303a * //
T13D4312-3:303a-3: rang gi blo'i stobs la sogs pa'i tshul gyis bsgrub
T13D4312-3:303a-4: par mi nus pa'i dngos po rang gi yul ma
T13D4312-3:303a-5: yin pa dag la phyogs 'dzin par byed pa ni
T13D4312-3:303a-6: mngon par zhen pa zhes bya ste /
T13D4312-3:303a-7: de'i dbang ni nus pa ste /
T13D4312-3:303a-8: mngon par zhen pa de lta bu'i dbang de las
T13D4312-3:303a-9: legs par bshad cing bstan pa'i sman dpyad kyi rgyud
T13D4312-3:303a-10: las shin tu rmongs shing yon tan dang /
T13D4312-3:303a-11: skyon gyi bye brag mi shes pas mngon par mi
T13D4312-3:303a-12: brtson zhing klog pa dang rtogs bar bya ba'i phyir
T13D4312-3:303a-13: brtson par mi byed pa de dag ni nges par
T13D4312-3:303a-14: rmongs par gyur pas dang po sman dpyad kyi bstan
T13D4312-3:303a-16: shlo ka 'bum yod pa'i gzhung la skyo ba med
T13D4312-3:303a-17: par bslab cing skyes bu'i tshe ji srid thub pa'i
T13D4312-3:303a-18: tshad lo brgya'i bar du bklags shing slob pas mngon
T13D4312-3:303a-19: par zhen pa mi 'dor ba de yang rmongs ba
T13D4312-3:303a-20: zhes bya'o // rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan zhi bya'i phyir //
T13D4312-3:303a-21: til mar mar sar sbrang rtsi rim bzhin bsten //
T13D4312-3:303a-22: de ltar tshangs pa 'am tshangs pa'i bu yis bshad //
T13D4312-3:303a-23: tshig gi dbye bas bshad kyang khyad 'phags med //
T13D4312-3:303a-24: ston pa po yi dbang gis ni //
T13D4312-3:303a-25: sman gyi nus pa khyad 'phags yin //
T13D4312-3:303a-26: de bas phrag dog spangs nas ni //
T13D4312-3:303a-27: bar ma nyid la bsten par bya //
T13D4312-3:303a-29: gal te gzhan dag 'di skad ces smra ba po'i
T13D4312-3:303a-30: khyad par las rdzas kyi nus pa yang phul du
T13D4312-3:303a-33: de ni de ltar ma yin te /
T13D4312-3:303a-34: gang gi phyir rlung gi nad la ni til mar phan la /
T13D4312-3:303a-35: mkhris pa'i nad la ni mar sar phan zhing /
T13D4312-3:303a-36: bad kan gyi nad la ni sbrang rtsi phan la /
T13D4312-3:303a-37: de ltar rim bzhin phan par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba de ltar tshangs pas bshad pa'am /
T13D4312-3:303a-38: tshangs pa'i bu sa ma ku m'a ras bshad pa'am /
T13D4312-3:303a-39: 'am zhes pa'i sgras ni kho bo cag la sogs pas bshad du zin kyang /
T13D4312-3:303a-40: de ni de dag nyid la gcig nas gcig tu lung brgyud pa yin gyi /
T13D4312-3:303a-41: sngags med par tshig gi sgras bstan pa'i khyad par
T13D4312-3:303a-42: nus pa'i khyad par du gyur pa yang ma yin
T13D4312-3:303a-43: te / smra ba po'i khyad par las sman gyi khyad par du 'phags pa ma yin pas /
T13D4312-3:303a-44: de'i phyir gnas pa ma yin pa la phrag dog
T13D4312-3:303a-45: byed pa de spangs shing bor nas phyogs su ma
T13D4312-3:303a-46: lhung ba'i lam bar ma nyid la blos ma bsten
T13D4312-3:303b-0: @303b rang nyid dus dang blo dang 'tsham pa'i bstan bcos gang yin pa yang shes par bya zhing /
T13D4312-3:303b-1: 'di ni dgos pa med pa yin no zhes brtags shing shes par bya'i /
T13D4312-3:303b-2: gnas ma yin pa la mngon par zhen par mi bya'o //
T13D4312-3:303b-3: drang srong gis bshad phyir dga' na //
T13D4312-3:303b-4: legs thos tsa ra kar ma zad //
T13D4312-3:303b-5: lug sogs kyis byas cis mi slob //
T13D4312-3:303b-6: de bas legs bshad gzung bar bya //
T13D4312-3:303b-8: gal te khyod 'di skad du kho bo ni drang
T13D4312-3:303b-9: srong gis bshad pa'i sman dpyad kyi rgyud la dga'
T13D4312-3:303b-10: zhing dang bas de nyid la slob par byed kyi
T13D4312-3:303b-11: / khyod kyi rgyud 'di la slob bar mi byed do zhes zer na /
T13D4312-3:303b-12: de ltar ni tsa ra [?] ka dang legs thos
T13D4312-3:303b-13: zhes bya ba'i gzhung de dag 'ba' zhig tu ma
T13D4312-3:303b-14: zad kyi / drang srong lug la sogs pas bshad
T13D4312-3:303b-15: pa'i lung gi gtsug lag rnams la khyod kyis ci'i
T13D4312-3:303b-17: drang srong gis byas pa kun la slob par rigs
T13D4312-3:303b-18: na legs par bshad pa la dga' ba'i phyir sman
T13D4312-3:303b-19: pa thams cad kyang tsa ra ka dang legs thos
T13D4312-3:303b-20: la mang du slob par byed kyi /
T13D4312-3:303b-21: drang srong lug la sogs pas bshad pa'i lung gtsug
T13D4312-3:303b-22: lag yod du zin kyang slob par mi byed do
T13D4312-3:303b-23: // de bas legs par bshad pa'i tshig gi sdeb
T13D4312-3:303b-24: sbyor dang ldan pa la dga' na yang kho bos
T13D4312-3:303b-25: bshad pa 'di nyid gzung zhing bslab par bya'o zhes
T13D4312-3:303b-27: 'di ni tshe yi rig byed rgya mtsho yi //
T13D4312-3:303b-28: snying po las ni snying po blangs nas su //
T13D4312-3:303b-29: rnam par sbyar las dge ba gang thob pa //
T13D4312-3:303b-30: de yis 'gro bas de nyid mthong bar shog / ces bya ba la /
T13D4312-3:303b-31: tshig 'dis ni gzhung rtsom par byed pas de yan chad gso ba'i bstan bcos rdzogs par byas nas /
T13D4312-3:303b-32: dge ba'i rtsab bsngo bar bya ba'i phyir smos pa yin te /
T13D4312-3:303b-33: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i rgyud 'di ni snying po dang 'dra ba yin la /
T13D4312-3:303b-34: gzhung gi don tshig tu rnam par sbyar ba'o //
T13D4312-3:303b-36: tshe'i rig byed kyi tshig gi tshogs rgya mtsho ltar
T13D4312-3:303b-37: zab cing rgya che ba'i snying por gyur pa yin
T13D4312-3:303b-38: te / de yang snying po zhes bya ba ni
T13D4312-3:303b-39: ji ltar 'gro ba rnams kyi snying ni lus kyi
T13D4312-3:303b-40: phyogs gcig na gnas su zin kyang lus kyi tshogs
T13D4312-3:303b-41: thams cad la khyab par byed pa yin no //
T13D4312-3:303b-42: de bzhin du yan lag brgyad pa 'dis yan lag
T13D4312-3:303b-43: brgyad dang ldan pa'i tshe'i rig byed thams cad khyab
T13D4312-3:304a-0: par byed de / gnas pas snying po dang chos mthun @304a * //
T13D4312-3:304a-1: pa'i phyir snying po zhes bya la /
T13D4312-3:304a-2: de lta bu'i snying po zhes bya ba'i don gyi mdo blangs shing btus nas /
T13D4312-3:304a-3: gzhung gi don tshig tu rnam par sbyar zhing bsdebs
T13D4312-3:304a-4: pa de las dge ba'i rtsa ba de dam pa'i
T13D4312-3:304a-5: rgyur gyur pa gang zhig thob cing rnyed par gyur
T13D4312-3:304a-6: pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dam pa des 'gro ba
T13D4312-3:304a-7: lnga pos bsdus pa'i 'jig rten 'di dag thams cad
T13D4312-3:304a-8: bde ba thams cad kyi mchog tu gyur pa de
T13D4312-3:304a-9: kho na nyid kyi don mthong ba zhes bya ba'i
T13D4312-3:304a-10: bde ba'i dam pa dang ldan par gyur cig ces
T13D4312-3:304a-11: bya ba rjes su bsngos pa yin no //
T13D4312-3:304a-12: yan lag brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba /
T13D4312-3:304a-13: slob dpon zla ba la dga' bas nges par sbyar
T13D4312-3:304a-14: ba las phyi ma'i gnas kyi le'u bzhi bcu pa'i
T13D4312-3:304a-17: // / dpal ldan pha khol sman pa'i mchog / tshe yi rig byed pha rol phyin //
T13D4312-3:304a-18: dri med shes pa ldan gyur pa //
T13D4312-3:304a-19: de yi gzhung bshad bdag gis byas //
T13D4312-3:304a-20: 'grel pa don mthun ming btags pa ;
T13D4312-3:304a-21: / gsal zhing mdor ni bsdus pa yi //
T13D4312-3:304a-22: tshig don zla zer zhes bya de //
T13D4312-3:304a-23: slob ma rtag tu dga' phyir dang //
T13D4312-3:304a-24: gang 'dir cung zad ma smras pa'am //
T13D4312-3:304a-25: legs bshad gang yin de dag kun //
T13D4312-3:304a-26: bdag gis rtogs nyes las gyur gyi //
T13D4312-3:304a-27: bdag gi bla mas nyes ma yin //
T13D4312-3:304a-28: bdag gi mes por gyur pa ni //
T13D4312-3:304a-29: dpal chen dga' ba zhes grags yin //
T13D4312-3:304a-30: deng sang na yang mkhas pa rnams //
T13D4312-3:304a-31: grags pa'i dri med sgrogs par byed //
T13D4312-3:304a-32: de yi bur gyur chags la dga' //
T13D4312-3:304a-33: de bu zla ba la dga' dag / slob dpon blo gros chen po ni //
T13D4312-3:304a-34: rgyun shes don ldan ming btags pa //
T13D4312-3:304a-35: don dam zhes bya sman pa'i mchog / kha che'i yul du skyes pa yin //
T13D4312-3:304a-36: rgyal po dpal ldan tha ga na //
T13D4312-3:304a-37: dpa' ba la sogs yon tan ldan //
T13D4312-3:304a-38: sa steng dgra las rgyal ba yi //
T13D4312-3:304a-39: sa bdag kun tu rgyal gyur cig / yan lag
T13D4312-3:304a-40: brgyad pa'i snying po'i rnam par 'grel pa tshig gi
T13D4312-3:304a-41: don gyi zla zer zhes bya ba /
T13D4312-3:304a-42: chags pa la dga' ba'i bu slob dpon zla ba
T13D4312-3:304a-43: la dga' ba zhes bya ba tshe'i rig byed kyi
T13D4312-3:304a-44: bstan bcos mtha' dag la mkhas pas mdzad pa rdzogs
T13D4312-3:304a-46: / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dza ran dha ra dang /
T13D4312-3:304a-47: zhu chen kyi lo ts'a ba dge slong rin chen
